54001010	neŵacencemesi , neŵalalume aŵacitane'fiŵipile , newatapa'ŵantu , neŵakuŵepa , neŵakulapa ifyaŵufi , nefintu fimbi kani epo fili ifileŋgulula uŵusambisi uŵukosele ;
54001011	koti Ceŵo leiweme icaŵuleme bwaŵaLesa aŵacindeme , icasisilwe kuli neŵo .
54001012	Ndukuŵatota aŵo aŵampele amakosa , eŵaKlistu Yesu ŵaSikulu ŵesu , pakuti ŵaliŋgeŵele ati wakucetekelwa , nekunjikalika ŵupyunjisi bwaŵo ;
54001013	naŋgawa ati akale nali wakucoŵola ŵaLesa , wakukululusya , muŋgwa ; sombi nalipokele iŋkumbu , pakuti nalificitile pakuŵula'mano , ili nsiŋgacetekela ;
54001014	popele uluse lwaŵaSikulu wesu lwalifulile ukwakuti pamo nekucetekela neŵutemwe uŵuli muli ŵaKlistu Yesu .
54001015	Isiwi ili lyakucetekelwa , Iyelelwe ukulisuminina konse , ati ŵaKlistu Yesu ŵaliisile mucalo capansi mukuŵapulusya aŵakuŵifya ; pali ŵo neŵo ndicilile pambifi .
54001016	Sombi pakuti pali fifi nalipokele iŋkumbu , ati muli neŵo , neucilile pambifi , ŋgaŵalanjisye umutimanteka waijkumbu syaŵo syonse ŵa Yesu Klistu , koti kesiŵilo kuli ŵaŵo aŵaisa ili ŵacetekela muli ŵo mukupoka Umweo uwamuyayaya .
54001017	Peŋka kuMfumu yamuyayaya , iyakuŵule'ŵosi , itaiŵonwa , ŵaLesa aŵali ŵamo ŵeŋka , ŋgakuŵe mucinsi neŵuleme insiku syonse isyamuyayaya . Ameni .
54001018	Ifunde ili ndukukuŵula , Timote wemwana wanji , koti fyakusimika ifyo ifyatanjilile ifyakuli weŵo , ati muli fyo mukalukulwa iŋkondo iweme ,
54001019	pakulukwikele nekucetekela nacimaŋga uweme ; pakuti ŵambi , pakumutamfya cimaŋgo' yo ŵaliŵundile koti bwato ifyakucetekela :
54001020	peŵumba lyaŵo epali Umenayo naAlecisanda , aŵa naposele kuli Satana , ati ŵakasambisiwe ati tekucoŵola ŵaLesa .
54002001	Ndukucenjesya lomba pakutaŋga , ati ukulomba nekutembela nekupapatila nekutota kukalukucitwa pakuti paŵantu ŵonse ;
54002002	napakuti pamfumu naŵo ŵonse aŵali neŵukulu paŵaŵyaŵo ; ati tukalukwikele nemweo uwakukutumana uwaŵutende mukupala-ŵaLesa konse nemucinsi .
54002003	Pakuti ifyo filiweme fyampokelo pamenso aŵaLesa aŵakutupulusya ,
54002004	aŵalukufwaya ati aŵantu ŵonse ŵakapuluke ŵafike kukwisiŵisya ŵucine .
54002005	Pakuti pali ŵaLesa ŵamo weŋka , neŋkusi imo yeŋka iyakulamwina ŵaLesa neŵantu , umuntu Klistu Yesu ,
54002006	uwaliposele cakuluŵula ŵonse , ŵumboni ubwapampindi ielelwe ŵo ;
54002007	naneŵo nalisalulwilwe wakuŵutulisya , nintanjisi ( ndukulaŵila ifyacine muli ŵaKlistu , nsilukuŵepa , yo ) , wakusambisya aŵenafyalo mukucetekela namuli ŵucine .
54002008	Ndukufwaya lomba , ati aŵalalume ŵakalukutembela pantu ponse , ili ŵasuntula amaŵoko aswetelele , ukwakuŵulo' kufitwa neli kupicisya .
54002009	Fyopele'fyo neŵanakasi ati ŵakalukufwala ifyakufwala Ifyakuwulo'kutaŋgala , nensoni nekutekanya ; tekufwale'misisi iyakupalata , neli ligolide neli niŵamagalite neli fyakufwala ifyamakweŵo apatali ;
54002010	sombi , koti fyelelwe aŵanakasi aŵalukusuminina ukupala-ŵaLesa , ŋgaŵafwale imilimo iweme .
54002011	Umwanakasi ŋgaasambile nekukutumana mukukomekwa konse .
54002012	Sombi nsilukusumina umwanakasi ukusambisya , neli kwikala newukulu pamwalalume , sombi ŋgaekale nekulukukutumene .
54002013	Pakuti Adama ewatanjile ukuŵumbwa , eli aŵumbilwe Efa ;
54002014	kaŵili Adama taatumpaicilwe , sombi umwanakasi , ili watumpaicilwe , aliŵele nekupulaisya .
54002015	Sombi akapuluka pakufyala aŵana , kani ŵoŵilo nemulume ŵakalukwikele mukucetekela namuŵutemwe namukuswetelela pamo nekutekanya .
54003001	Isiwi ili lyakucetekelwa , ati kani umuntu atinamine ŵucilolo ubwamwikelesya , alukufwaye'milimo iweme .
54003002	Ukwelelwa icilolo , lomba , ukulukwikele cakuŵule'milandu , mulume wamwanakasi umo eŋka , cakuliteka , camilaŋgwe , caŵunjino , cakupokela bwino aŵensu , camano akusambisya ,
54003003	cakuŵulo'kupendwa , cakuŵulo'kupuma , cakuŵulo'kukumbwo'ŵuŵoni , yo ; sombi citekenye , cakuŵulo'kulwa , cakuŵule'cikani ,
54003004	cakwikalika bwino iŋanda yacico icine , ili cikomeka aŵana ŵacico nemucinsi wonse ;
54003005	( sombi kani umuntu tesi ukwikalika iŋanda yakwe umwine , mbasyani aŋgalame'kelesya lyaŵaLesa ? )
54003006	Tekwelelwa ukwikalika ŵucilolo umuntu uwakwalulula ŵukumo lukoso , eŋgesakulitota nekuponena mukusininwa kwamusensesi .
54003007	Sombi kaŵili ukwelelwa ye ukwikala naŵumboni uŵuweme uŵusimicilwe kuŵaposonde , eŋgesa-kuponena mumipufyo namucakuteya camusensesi .
54003008	Ŵadikoni fyopele'fyo ŋgawekale ŵamucinsi , ŵakuŵule'mini siŵili , ŵakuŵulo'kunwe'mfaina isinji , ŵakuŵulo'kukumbwo'ŵuŵoni ,
54003009	ŵakwikala necamfiso cakucetekela nacimaŋga uswetele .
54003010	Naŵaŵo naŵo ŋgawakataŋge ukuŵesya , eli ŵakapyuŋge ifyaŵudikoni , kani ŵali ŵakuŵule'milandu .
54003011	Aŵanakasi fyopele'fyo ŋgaŵekale ŵamucinsi , ŵakuŵulo'kusensa aŵaŵyaŵo , ŵatekenye , ŵakucetekelwa mufintu fyonse .
54003012	Ŵadikoni ŋgawekale ŵalume ŵamukasi umo , ŵakwikalika bwino aŵana ŵaŵo newamuŋanda syaŵo aŵene .
54003013	Pakuti aŵo aŵapyunjile bwino ŵudikoni ŵalukulipokela amekalilo ampokelo aweme nelupata ulukulu ulwamukucetekela ukuli muli ŵaKlistu Yesu .
54003014	Ndukukulembele'fyo-fintu , ili ncetekela ati ŋkese bwaŋgu kuli weŵo ;
54003015	sombi kani ŋkakokola , ati ukesiŵe ifyo ifyelelwe aŵantu pakwikala muŋanda yaŵaLesa , emwikelesya lyaŵaLesa ŵamweo , ulupanda necakwiŵaka-po icaŵucine .
54003016	Kaŵili ukwakuŵulo'kupicisya icamfiso icakupala-ŵaLesa cikulu : eWaŵo , aŵabwenekele mumunefu , aŵalunjicilwe muMupasi , aŵabwenwe kuŋkalamba isyakwiulu , aŵatulisiwe mumisyoŵo yaŵantu , aŵacetekelwe mucalo capansi , aŵapokelwe kwiulu muŵuleme .
54004001	Sombi Umupasi walaŵila ukuswetele , ati pampindi syapantanjile ŵambi ŵakafuma kukucetekela , pakukutika imipasi iyakutumpaika neŵusambisi bwafiŵanda ,
54004002	pakuti pakutumpaika kwaŵantu aŵakuŵepa , aŵapile muli ŵacimaŋga ŵaŵo koti nikucela camulilo ,
54004003	aŵakukanyo'kuupa , nekufunda aŵantu ati ŵalikanye ifyakulya , ifi waleŋgele ŵaLesa ati ŵakafipoke nekutota aŵantu aŵakucetekela neŵakwisiŵisya ŵucine .
54004004	Pakuti ifyaleŋgelwe kuli ŵaLesa fyonse filiweme , nakaŵili papa fyakuposeka lukoso , pakufipoka nekutota ;
54004005	pakuti filaswesiwa kwisiwi lyaŵaLesa nakukutembela .
54004006	Pakuŵacenjesya aŵakwasu ifyafintu ifyo , ukaŵa mupyunjisi uweme uwaŵaKlistu Yesu , ukosiwe mumasiwi akucetekela , namuŵusambisi uŵuweme uŵu walondaisye ;
54004007	sombi ufume-ko kufisimicisyo ifiŵipile ifitumpile ifyaŵanakasi aŵakote . Ulukulikosya ati ukaŵe nekupala-ŵaLesa .
54004008	Pakuti ukulukukosyo'muŵili kulikwelelwe weŵo panini ; sombi ukupala-ŵaLesa kulikwelelwe pafintu fyonse , pakuti kuli nekulaya kwamweo utuli-mo ŵukumo nekwawoyo ukesa .
54004009	Isiwi ili lyakucetekelwa , lilielelwe ukulisuminina konse .
54004010	Pakuti pali fyefyo epo tupyuŋga nekulukulwa , pakuti ulucetekelo Iwesu lwasiŋkamana pali ŵaLesa ŵamweo , aŵakupulusya ŵaŵantu ŵonse , tanje cine ŵaŵaŵo aŵacetekela .
54004011	Ulukufifunda nekufisambisya ifintu ifyo .
54004012	Aŵantu ŵonse neli umo ŵepufya uwusaŋkwa ŵoŵe ; sombi uŵe wakutuntulula kuli ŵaŵo aŵacetekela , mwisiwi , namumiŵelo yakwikala , namuŵutemwe , namumupasi , namukucetekela , namukusweta .
54004013	Ili nsiŋgesa , koŵika-po umutima pakupenda amalembo , napakucenjesya , napakusambisya .
54004014	Tekupufya impese ili muli weŵo , iyapelwe kuli weŵo pakuti pakusimika , pakukutintilapo iminwe iŵumba lyaŵakulu ŵekelesya .
54004015	Kocitisya ifintu ifi , ulipose muli fyo , ati ukwenda koŵe kuntanjile kukaŵoneke kuŵantu ŵonse .
54004016	Kolicenjelela wemwine neŵusambisi ŵoŵe . Ulukwikele mufintu ifi . Pakuti , pakucite'fyo , ukalipulusya , nekupulusya naŵaŵo aŵakukumfwa weŵo .
54005001	Tekupatila umukulu , sombi umucenjesye koti niŵawiso ; newasaŋkwa uŵacenjesye koti ŵakwanu ;
54005002	neŵanakasi aŵakulu koti niŵanyinenwe ; neŵanakasi aŵanice koti niŋkasi syoŵe mukusweta konse .
54005003	Ŵamukamfwilwe aŵanakasi uŵapele umucinsi , kani ŵali niŵamukamfwilwe icine .
54005004	Sombi kani mukamfwilwe ali neŵana kani ŵensikulu , ŋgawataŋge ŵasambile ukucita ukupala-ŵaLesa kuŵamucikoto caŵo aŵene , nekuŵabwesesya ifiweme aŵaŵafyele ; pakuti ifyo filiweme , fyampokelo pamenso aŵaLesa .
54005005	Sombi uyo-mwanakasi mukamfwilwe icinenene , usyele eŋka , alasiŋkamicila ukucetekela kuli ŵaLesa , nekulukupapata nekutembela uŵusiku nekasuŵa .
54005006	Sombi uyo , ulukulonde'fyakukumbwa fyakwe , alifwile ili ali nemweo .
54005007	Nafyefyo nafyo kofunda , ati ŵakalukuli ŵakuŵule'milandu .
54005008	Sombi kani umbi taalukuŵaŵicila bwino aŵakwe , tanje cine awamuŋanda yakwe umwine , uyo akana ukucetekela , aliŵipile ukucila napamuntu utaacetekela .
54005009	Umwanakasi mukamfwilwe ekalembwa , utaiŋgakumana amakumi asanu nalimo imyaka yakwe , uwali mukasi wamulume umo eŋka ,
54005010	utulicilwe kumilimo iweme ; kani walilelele aŵana , kani walukupokela bwino aŵensu , kani walukusamfya amakasa awaluŋgeme , kani walukuŵofwa-ko aŵapeŋgele , kani walukulondaisya imilimo yonse iweme .
54005011	Sombi ŵamukamfwilwe aŵanakasi aŵanice ukaŵakane ; pakuti , pakuŵapufya ŵaKlistu , ŵalafwayo'kuupwa ;
54005012	ili ŵasininwe , pakuti ŵaliposele ukucetekela kwaŵo ukwakutaŋga ,
54005013	Nakaŵili ŵalasambila uŵufila , nekulukutantaka'mananda ; sombi taŵali ŵafila lukoso , koku , sombi ŵalalakaka nekulukufuluŋganya imilimo yaŵaŵyaŵo , ili ŵalaŵila ifitafyelelwe .
54005014	Ndukufwaya lomba ati aŵo aŵataŵacekwile ŵakopwe , ŵafyale aŵana , ŵekalike awamuŋanda , ŵaŵulo'kukapela' kapondo umwakutoŋgawila ;
54005015	pakuti ŵambi ŵapasuka'kale ukulukuya kuli Satana .
54005016	Kani umbi umwalalume kani mwanakasi , ulukucetekela , ali neŵanakasi ŵamukamfwilwe , ŋgaawofweko , ikelesya liikakatasiwa ; ati likaŵofwe-ko aŵo aŵali niŵamukamfwilwe icine .
54005017	Aŵakulu aŵo aŵaŵekalika bwino aŵantu ŋgawakebwe ŵelelwe ukucindikwa kuŵili , tanje cine aŵo aŵalukupyuŋga mwisiwi namuŵusambisi .
54005018	Pakuti ilembo lilalaŵila ati : Tekukake'ŋombe pakanwa ili inyanta-po pamasaka ! Kaŵili ati : Umupyunjisi alielelwe ukulambulwa kwakwe .
54005019	Tekupoka-po ukumusinina umukulu , kani toumfwile kumboni siŵili kani sitatu .
54005020	Aŵo aŵakuŵifya ukawaleŋgulule pamenso aŵantu ŵonse , ati aŵakusyala-po ŵakaŵe nekutina .
54005021	Ndukukulapisya pamenso aŵaLesa napamenso aŵaSikulu Yesu Klistu napamenso aŋkalamba isisalulwilwe , ati ulukucite'fi-fintu ukwakuŵulo'kusalulula , nekuŵulo'kucita neli kantu koti kutemasya .
54005022	Tekukantika-po iminwe yoŵe paŵantu ŵonse neli umo ukwakumanama , neli kwaŵana naŵo ifyakuŵifya fyaŵantu ŵambi ; ulukulilama uswetele .
54005023	Tekulukunwa amenda eŋka ŵukumo , sombi unwe utufaina tunini pakuti pamala oŵe napakuti pakunaka koŵe ukwinji .
54005024	Ukuŵifya kwaŵantu ŵambi kulibwenekele limo , ukulukutanjilila kukusininwa , sombi ŵambi kulaŵalonda panuma .
54005025	Fyopele'fyo epo kuli ukucita ukuweme ukubwenekele limo ; nakoko nako ukutakubwenekele limo takwisi ukufiwa .
54006001	Ŵonse aŵo aŵali ŵasya aŵapacikoŋkoli ŋgaŵalukuŵeŵa ŵawisikuluŵo aŵene ati ŵelelwe uŵuleme ŵonse , liŋgesa-kucoŵolwa isina lyaŵaLesa neŵusambisi .
54006002	Naŵaŵo naŵo aŵali naŵawisikuluŵo aŵalukucetekela ŵekaŵapufya , pakuti ŵakwaŵo ; sombi tanje cine ŋgaŵalukuŵapyunjila , pakuti aŵo aŵalukupoka imilimo iyo iweme ŵakucetekela , ŵatemiwe . Ifintu ifyo ulukufisambisya nekulukucenjesya .
54006003	Kani umbi alukusambisya uŵusambisi uŵupusene , nekuŵulo'kwasumina amasiwi akosele aweme aŵaSikulu ŵesu Yesu Klistu , neli kuŵusumina uŵusambisi uŵuli koti kupala-ŵaLesa ;
54006004	uyo eutumpile ulukulitota , utesiŵile bwino neli kantu , sombi ulukusiluka kufyakwipusya nefyakupicisya ifyamasiwi , muli fyo emo mufuma icikani , neluŵo , nekucoŵola , nemileŋgululo iŵipile ,
54006005	nekupikansyanya kwaŵantu aŵaŵipile mumitima aŵataŵakwete ŵucine , aŵalukulaŋguluka ati ukupala-ŵaLesa cakunoŋkela-mo . Kofuma kuŵakuŵe'fyo .
54006006	Sombi ukupala-ŵaLesa pamo nemutimanteka ekunoŋka ukukulu .
54006007	Pakuti tatwaletele neli kantu mucalo capansi ; kaŵili icine tatwisi ukufumya-mo neli kantu ;
54006008	sombi pakwikala nefyakulya nefyakulifimba tukalukuli nefyakukumana .
54006009	Sombi aŵo aŵalukufwayo'kuŵila ŵalaponena mucakwesya namukukumbwa ukwinji ukutumpile ukwakuŵifya ukuŵeŵisya aŵantu mukonalwa nekwipaiwa .
54006010	Pakuti ukulukutemwa indalama musyu wakuŵifya konse ; popele ŵambi , pakusikumbwa , ŵalipasucile kukucetekela , nekulukulilasala kunsoni isinji .
54006011	Sombi weŵo , wemuntu waŵaLesa , koŵutuka ukufyuka kufintu ifyo ; ulukulonda ukuluŋgama , nekupala-ŵaLesa , nekucetekela , neŵutemwe , nemutimanteka , nekutekanya .
54006012	Ulukulwa uluŵo uluweme ulwakucetekela , wikatisye umweo wamuyayaya , umo waitilwe-mo , nekusuminina insuminino iweme pamenso amboni isinji .
54006013	Ndukukufunda pamenso aŵaLesa , aŵafipelo'mweo ifintu fyonse , napali ŵaKlistu Yesu aŵasimicile ukusuminina ukuweme pamenso akwe Pontyo Pilati ,
54006014	ati ulukulame'funde , ukwakuŵula neli cisemba neli mulandu , ukuficila kukuŵoneka kwaŵaSikulu ŵesu Yesu Klistu ;
54006015	ukuŵoneko'ko pampindi syaŵo aŵene ŵakakubwenesya aŵo aŵacindeme , aŵamakosa aŵali ŵeŋka , Imfumu yamafumu , ŵaWisikuluŵo ŵasikulu ;
54006016	aŵali ŵeŋka aŵamweo uwakuŵulo'kufwa , aŵekala mukutuŵa ukutakufikwa-ko ; aŵa tawaŋgawona aŵantu ŵonse neli umo , neli kwisiŵa ukuwona : kuli ŵo ŋgakuwe uŵuleme nemakosa amuyayaya . Ameni .
54006017	Ulukuŵafunda aŵo aŵaŵile pampindi ino iyaŵukumo ati ŵelitota , ŵepema-mo mukukanika kwamaŵoni , sombi ŋgaŵalukupema-mo muli ŵaLesa ŵamweo , aŵatupele'fintu fyonse neŵupe ati tusaŋgalale nafyo .
54006018	Ŋgaŵalukucite'fiweme ati ŵakafule mumilimo iweme , ati ŵakaŵe nemitima yaŵupe , ŵakuŵaaŵanisisya ŵambi ;
54006019	nekulukuliŵicila icakwiŵacila-po iciweme pakuti pampindi ikesa , ati ŵakekatisye umweo uwacine .
54006020	WeTimote , ulukucilama bwino ico icisisilwe kuli weŵo , nekulukufutatila ukulakaka ukwamipufyo nekuleŋgulula kwamano ayo ŵaŵepele ukwilike'fyo ;
54006021	ayo ŵambi pakwasuminina ŵalikupusile ukucetekela . Uluse Iwikale naweŵo . Ameni .
55001001	NePaulu , nentanjisi yaŵaKlistu Yesu kukufwaya kwaŵaLesa , koti kulaya kwaMweo uyo uli muli ŵaKJisiu Yesu ,
55001002	ndukukulembela Timote , wemwana wanji untemenwe ; pekale uluse neŋkumbu neŵutende , ubwakufuma kuli ŵaLesa ŵaWisifwe nakuli ŵaKlistu Ycsu ŵaSikulu ŵesu .
55001003	Ndukutota ŵaLesa , aŵo mpyunjila nacimaŋga uswetele koti nifyopele'fyo ifi ŵalukucita ŵawisifwe , ati nsilukuleko' kukulaŋguluka pakulukulomba ; uŵusiku nekasuŵa
55001004	ndukufwaisyo'kukuŵona , nekulukulaŋguluka iminsosi yoŵe , ati ŋkesule ukusaŋgalala ;
55001005	ili ndaŋgulusiwe ukueetekela ukwakuŵulo'kutumpaika ukuli muli weŵo , ukwatanjile ukwikala muli ŵaLoisi ŵakapa ŵoŵe namuli ŵaYunike ŵanoko ; kaŵili ndukueetekela ati namuli weŵo .
55001006	Pakuti paeeŵo ico ndukukulaŋgulusya ati ukaŵusye impese yaŵaLesa , iyo ili muli weŵo pakuti pakukutintila-po iminwe yanji .
55001007	Pakuti ŵaLesa taŵatupele-po umupasi wamwenso , sombi ŵalitupele umupasi wamakosa neŵutemwe nekueenjesya .
55001008	Tekulukuŵa nensoni lomba pakuti pali ŵumboni bwaŵaSikulu ŵesu , neli bwanji neŵo nekaili waŵo , sombi ulukusomenwa ukupeŋga pamo nafweŵo muCeŵo Iciweme , koti makosa aŵaLesa ,
55001009	awatupulwisye , nekutwita nekwita ukuswetelele , tekoti milimo yesu , koku , sombi koti kufwaya kwaŵo aŵene ukulandicile neluse , ulwapelwe kuli fweŵo muli ŵaKlistu Yesu , lomba tasiŋgatatika impindi syamuyayaya ,
55001010	sombi lulibwenekele ŵukumo pakuti pakuŵoneka Aŵakupulusya ŵesu Klistu Yesu , aŵayalwile yalukoso imfwa , nekuleta apaswetele umweo nekuŵulo'kufwa pakuti paCeŵo leiweme ,
55001011	ico nasalulwilwe mukutulisya , nintanjisi , musambisi uwakuŵenafyalo .
55001012	Pakuti paeeŵo ico ndukusomenwa nafifi-fintu ; sombi nsikwete-nsoni ; pakuti ndiŵesi aŵo aŵa nectekele , nekwisiŵisya ati ŵali nemakosa akulame'ci naŵapele ukufika nakukasuŵa ako .
55001013	Ikatisya akesiŵilo kamasiwi akosele aweme , awaumfwile kuli neŵo , mukueetekela namuŵutemwe uŵuli muli ŵaKlistu Yesu .
55001014	Ico-cintu iciweme icapelwe kuli weŵo ulukueilama muMupasi Uswetelele uwikala muli fweŵo .
55001015	Ifi uliisiŵile ati ŵalimfutatile ŵonse aŵamuealo caAsya ; mwiŵumba lyaŵo emo ŵali Fugelo naElimogene .
55001016	ŴaSikulu ŋgaŵaŵacitile'ŋkumbu aŵamuŋanda yakwe Onesifolo : pakuti aliŋkatulwisye liŵili liŵili , taaŵele nensoni pakuti paminyololo yanji ;
55001017	sombi ili ali muLoma , alukumfwaya-fwaya muŋkonsya , nekumbona ,
55001018	( ŵaSikulu ŵamusumine ati akaŵone iŋkumbu kuli ŵaSikulu akasuŵa ako ) ; kaŵili uliisi bwino ifintu ifyo ifinji ifi ampyunjile kuEfesa .
55002001	Pakuti pali fyefyo , wemwana wanji , ukose muluse ululi muli ŵaKlistu Yesu .
55002002	Kaŵili ifintu ifyo ifi waumfwile kuli ncŵo mumboni isinji , ifyo ukaŵapele aŵantu aŵakuectekelwa , aŵakalukuli nemano akuŵasambisya naŵambi .
55002003	Ulukusomenwa ukupeŋga pamo naneŵo koti musilikani uweme uwaŵaKlistu Yesu .
55002004	Papo'musilikani paŋkondo uŋgalipambulula nefyeŵo fyamweo uno ; alukufwayo'kumutemwesya uyo uwamulembele muŵusilikani .
55002005	Kaŵili kani umuntu alukwesya amakosa akwe mumapukuto neŵaŵyakwe , taapoka-po umuntinya waŵuleme , kani tacsesye koti mafunde ao .
55002006	Umulimi ulukucite'milimo euŋgataŋgo'kupoka ifisepo .
55002007	Alakanya ifi ndukulaŵila , pakuti ŵaSikulu wakakupele'milaŋgwe mufintu fyonse .
55002008	Laŋguluka ŵaYesu Klistu , aŵaŵucile paŵafwile , aŵafumine muŵana ŵakwe Dafidi , koti Ceŵo canji leiweme :
55002009	muli ceco emo ndukusomenwa ukupeŋga mufyakukaka , koti nimbifi ; sombi lsiwi lyaŵaLesa talikacilwe .
55002010	Pakuti pali fyefyo ndukusumine'fintu fyonse pakuti paŵasalulwilwe , ati naŵaŵo ŵakapoke ukupuluka ukuli muli ŵaKlistu Yesu neŵuleme bwamuyayaya .
55002011	Isiwi ili lyakueetekelwa : ati , Pakuti kani twalifwile pamo naŵo , tukalukwikele nemweo pamo naŵo kawili ;
55002012	kani tulukukoselela , tukalukwikele neŵufumu pamo naŵo ; kani tukaŵakane , naŵo ŵakatukana fweŵo :
55002013	kani tuŵe nekuŵulo'kueetekela , naŋgawe'fyo ŵo ŵalekalilila ŵakueetokelwa ; pakuti taŵesi ukulikana .
55002014	Ukawalaŋgulusye ifyo-fintu , ili uŵafundisya pamenso aŵaSikulu , ati tekulukupicisya'masiwi ukwalukoso , ukulukuŵaŵifya aŵalukumfwa .
55002015	Kokonsya ukuliposa usumininwe kuli ŵaLcsa , umuntu wamilimo utaakwete umulandu uwakumuleŋgesye'nsoni , ulunjika bwino isiwi lyaŵucine .
55002016	Sombi ulukusesya ukulakaka kwamipufyo : pakuti uko kukaficila kuli fimbi ifyakupufya ŵaLesa ;
55002017	nesiwi lyakuko nalyo likalukufukuka koti cilonda iciŵolele ; pali kuko epo ŵali Umenayo naFileto ,
55002018	awantu aŵapusile ŵucine , pakulaŵila ati ukuŵuka kwaŵafwile kulicitilwe akale ; popele ŵalukuwisya ukucetekela kwaŵantu ŵambi .
55002019	Naŋgawe'fyo icakwiŵacila-po caŵaLesa cilekala cikosele , icili nekesiŵilo aka ati : ŴaSikulu ŵaliŵesiŵile aŵaŵo ; nakaŵili ati : Ŋgaŵafume-po pafisendeme ŵonse aŵo aŵasimbula isina lyaŵaSikulu .
55002020	Lomba muŋanda ikulu tamuli inoŋgo isyegolide nesyesilifa syeŋka , koku , sombi emo sili nesyaciti nesyeŵumba ; kaŵili simbi syaŵuleme , sombi simbi nasyo syamipufyo .
55002021	Pakuti pali fyefyo kani umuntu nekuliswesya ukufuma pali syesyo isyamipufyo , akaŵa ninoŋgo iyaŵuleme , iswetelele ielelwe imilimo yaŵawisikulu , i yansicilwe limo ukulukucite' milimo yonse iweme .
55002022	Sombi ufyuke kukukumbwa kwaŵusaŋkwa ; ulukulonda ukuluŋgama , nekueetekela , neŵutomwe , neŵutende , pamo naŵaŵo aŵalukulilila ŵaSikulu mumitima iswetele .
55002023	Sombi ifyakwipusya ifitumpile ifyakuŵula'mano ufikane , pakuti uliisi ati filaŵusya uluŵo .
55002024	Kansi umupyunjisi waŵaSikulu tekwelelwa ye ukulwa ; sombi ukwelelwa ye ukuŵaŵela nekutekanya aŵantu ŵonse , nemano akusambisya , neŋkumbu ,
55002025	ukulukuŵaeenjesya nemutima uwakulicefya aŵo aŵalukuliimika , kuleŋga ŵaLesa ŵakaŵapele cipale ukwaluluka ukulukwisiŵa ŵucine ,
55002026	nakaŵili ati ŵakaliŵusye ukufuma mucakuteya camusensesi , aŵaiketwe kuli ye ukulukucita koti kufwaya kwaŵaLesa .
55003001	Sombi wisiŵe'fi ati pansiku syakupela-ko pakesa impindi syaŵukali ;
55003002	pakuti aŵantu ŵakalukuli ŵakulitemwa , ŵakutemwa indalama , ŵamaŋkuluŵinda , wakutaŋgala , ŵakueoŵola , ŵakupulaisya aŵaŵafyele , ŵakuŵulo'kutota , ŵaŵipile ,
55003003	ŵakuŵule'mitima inacile iyakutemwa koti kwisiŵila kwaŵantunsi , ŵakuŵulo'kufituluka , ŵasensesi , ŵakuŵulo'kuteke'mitima , ŵakali , ŵakuŵulo'kutemwe'fiweme ,
55003004	niŵamwaluka , fiŋgaiŋgai , ŵakulitota ukutumpile , ŵakutemwo'tuseko ukucila napakutemwa ŵaLesa ;
55003005	ŵakwikala nemekalilo akupala-ŵaLesa , sombi ŵalukukana' makosa akuko : aŵo naŵo uŵafutatile .
55003006	Pakuti peŵumba lyaŵo epali ŵaŵo aŵafukanjilila mumananda , nekwikata aŵanakasi aŵatumpile , awatwicilwe ifyakuŵifya , aŵatwitwe kukukumbwa ukwinji ,
55003007	aŵalukusambila insiku syonse , aŵataŵesi ukufika kukwisiŵa ŵucine .
55003008	Koti nifyefyo ifi ŵamucieile Mose Yane naYambile , fyopele'fyo naŵaŵo ŵalacicila ŵucine ; aŵantu aŵaŵipile mumitima , awafinaŋgwa kukueetekela .
55003009	Sombi taŵakaficila kuntanjile , ŵaŵa : pakuti ukutumpa kwaŵo kukabwenekesya kuŵantu ŵonse , koti nifyopele'fyo ifi kwaŵele nekwaŵaŵo-ŵalalume .
55003010	Sombi weŵo ulilondaisye bwino uŵusambisi bwanji , nekwikala kwanji , nekufwaya ukulandicile , nekueetekela , neŋkumbu , neŵutemwe , nemutimanteka ,
55003011	nekukululuka , nekusomenwa ; nefintu ifyaŵele pali neŵo kuAntioke nakuIkonya nakuLusiala ; nekukululuka uko naumfwile ; sombi muli fyo fyonse ŵaSikulu eŵampulwisye .
55003012	Icine kaŵili , ŵonse awalukufwavo'kwikala ukupala-ŵaLesa muli ŵaKlistu Yesu ŵakakululuka .
55003013	Sombi aŵantu ŵakuŵifya neŵakutumpaika kufipa ŵakalukuya ili ŵalunduluka nekuŵipa , ili ŵatumpaika nekulukutumpaikwa .
55003014	Sombi weŵo ŋgolukwikele mufintu ifyo ifi wasambile nekueetekela , ili wisiŵa aŵo aŵakusambisye ;
55003015	pakuti ukufuma kubwanice waliisiŵile amalembo aswetelele , esi ukukupela amano akukupulusya , pakuti pakueetekela ukuli muli ŵaKlistu Yesu .
55003016	Amalembo onse alunjicilwe afumine kuli ŵaLesa alielelwe ukusambisya , nekueenjesya , nekulunjika , nekufunda ukuluŋgeme :
55003017	ati umuntu waŵaLesa akalukuli uwaminine , ukonsiwe lukoso ukulukucite'milimo yonse iweme .
55004001	Ndukukulapisya , pamenso aŵaLesa napamenso aŵaKlistu Yesu , aŵakasololola neŵalaŵi neŵafwile , nakukuŵoneka kwaŵo nakuŵufumu bwaŵo ;
55004002	ati ulukutulisya lsiwi ; ulukukosa pampindi syonse isiweme nesitasiweme-po ; nekulukukanya , nekulukuleŋgulula , nekulukueenjesya , neŋkumbu syonse neŵusambisi .
55004003	Pakuti impindi ikesa lomba taŵakasumina uŵusambisi uŵukosele ; sombi , pakuti pakunenena amatwi aŵo , ŵakaliwuŋganisisya aŵasambisi aŵali koti kukumbwa kwaŵo aŵene ;
55004004	popele ŵakataŵuka-ko amatwi aŵo ukwafumya kuli ŵucine , nekupasuka ukulukuya kutisimicisyo .
55004005	Sombi ulukulikanya mufintu fyonse , nekulukusomenwa ukupeŋga , nekucite'milimo iyakutulisya leeŵo leiweme , nekukumanisya uŵupyunjisi ŵoŵe .
55004006	Pakuti naŵukumo ndukwitululwa koti mulambu , nempindi yakukumbuluka kwanji nayo yapalamina .
55004007	Nalwa uluŵo uluweme ; nasilisya ukuŵutuka ; nalamo'kueetekela :
55004008	lomba paliŵicilwe pakuti pali neŵo umuntinya wakuluŋgama , uyo ŵakampela neŵo pakasuŵa ako ŵaSikulu awasololwesi awaluŋgeme , neŵo neŋka koku , sombi ŵakaŵapela naŵaŵo ŵonse aŵatemenwe ukuwoneka kwaŵo .
55004009	Wesye makosa ukwisa bwaŋgu kuli neŵo :
55004010	pakuti Dema alindekele , pakuti pakwitemwa impindi ino iyaŵukumo , nekuya kuTesalonike ; Klesike aliile kuealo caGalatya , naTito naye kuealo caDalimatya .
55004011	Luku eŋka ali naneŵo . Ukapinte Mako , akese naweŵo ; pakuti alielelwe neŵo ukupyuŋga .
55004012	Sombi Tuciko nalitumine kuEfesa .
55004013	Icakufwala ico nasile kuTilowa kuli Kapo ukacilete pakwisa , pamo nemabuku , sombi tanje cine ifiseŵa ifyakulemba-po .
55004014	Alecisanda umufusi wamukuŵa alincitile ifiŵipile ifinji ; ŵaSikulu ŵakamubwesesya koti milimo yakwe .
55004015	Kuli woyo koeenjela naweŵo ; pakuti alicicile ukwakuti amasiwi esu .
55004016	Pakulilaŵilila ncŵo pakutaŋga papo'muntu uwaŋgofwele-ko , sombi ŵonse ŵalindekele ; fikebwa ati mulandu waŵo .
55004017	Sombi ŵaSikulu ŵaliimakene pali neŵo nekuŋkosya , ati iceŵo cikatulike ukwakukumana muli neŵo , neŵenafyalo ŵonse naŵo ati ŵakomfwe ; popele nalisompwelwe mukanwa kaŋkalamu .
55004018	ŴaSikulu ŵakansompola kumilimo yonse iŵipile , nekumpulusya ukunyinjisya muWufumu bwaŵo ubwakwiulu , Kuli ŵo kuŵe uŵuleme insiku syonse isyamuyayaya . Ameni .
55004019	Ukaŵasekele Pilisika naAkwila , neŵamuŋanda yakwe Onesifolo .
55004020	Elasito aliikele kuKolinto . Sombi Tilofimo nalimusile kuMileto mulwele .
55004021	Wesye makosa ukwisa ili tauŋgeso'mwela . Yubulo alukukusekela , naPude naLino naKlodya neŵakwasu ŵonse ŵalukukusekela .
55004022	ŴaSikulu ŋgaŵekale nemupasi woŵe . Uluse lwikale nenu . Ameni .
56001001	NinePaulu , nemupyunjisi waŵaLesa , nentanjisi yaŵaYesu Klistu , koti kucetekela kwaŵasalulwilwe ŵaŵaLesa , nakoti kwisiŵa kwaŵucine uŵuli koti kupala-ŵaLesa ,
56001002	nendukucetekela ukupoka umweo wamuyayaya , uyu ŵalaile ŵaLesa , aŵataŵaŵepa , ili tasiŋgatatika impindi syamuyayaya ;
56001003	sombi pampindi syaŵo aŵene ŵalibwenesye isiwi lyaŵo muceŵo ico ici nacetekelwe ukutulisya koti kufunda kwaŵaLesa aŵakutupulusya .
56001004	Ndukukulembela , Tito , wemwana wanji uwacine koti kucetekela kwesu fwense : uluse neŵutende , ubwakufuma kuli ŵaLesa ŵaWisifwe nakuli ŵaKlistu Yesu aŵakutupulusya , bwikale naweŵo .
56001005	Pakuti paceŵo ico nalikusile muCilete , ati ukafiansike bwino ifintu ifyasyele-po , nekwikalika aŵakulu mumisi yonse , koti nifyopele'fyo ifi nakuŵulile ;
56001006	kani umuntu wakuŵule'milandu , mulume wamwanakasi umo , uli neŵana aŵalukucetekela awataŵasininwe pakuti paŵucencemesi neli nipakuti paŵuŋgwa .
56001007	Pakuti ukwelelwa icilolo cekelesya ukulukwikele cakuŵule'milandu , pakuti co muntu wakutaŵa-taŵa kuli ŵaLesa ; umuntu uwakuŵule'citala , utaafitwa bwaŋgu , utaatosya pakupendwa , uwakuŵulo'ŵuŋgwa , utaakumbwe'ndalama isiŵipile ;
56001008	sombi uwakupokelela bwino aŵensu , uwakutemwe'fiweme , uwamilaŋgwe yamano , uluŋgeme , uswetelele , ulikanya ifyafintu fyonse ;
56001009	ulukwikatilila isiwi ilyakucetekelwa ilili koti ŵusambisi , ati akalukuli nemakosa akucenjesya muŵusambisi uŵukosele nekuŵasinina aŵakuleŋgulula .
56001010	Pakuti epo ŵali aŵoŋgwa aŵenji , aŵamaŋkuluŵinda , aŵakutumpaika , tanje cine aŵakopwelwe ,
56001011	ukwelelwa ukuŵasiŋka mutunwa . Ŵali ŵantu aŵawisya amaŋanda aŵuluŵulu , nekulukusambisya ifintu ifitafyelelwe , pakuti pandalama isiŵipile .
56001012	Umbi uwapeŵumba lyaŵo , uwakusimika waŵo aŵene , walilaŵile ati : AŵaCilete ŵalaŵepa insiku syonse , filwani ifiŵipile , niŵapumpunta aŵafila .
56001013	Ukusimiko'ko kwacine . Pakuti paceŵo ico ukaŵapatile makosa , ati ŵakakose mukucetekela ,
56001014	aŵakuŵulo'kukutika ifisimicisyo fyaŵaJuda , nemafunde aŵantu aŵafutata kuli ŵucine .
56001015	Kuŵaswetele ifintu fyonse filiswetele : sombi kuŵaŵipile nakuli ŵaŵo aŵataŵacetekela takuli-po iciswetele , sombi amano aŵo naŵacimaŋga ŵaŵo , fyoŵilo fyaŵipa'kale .
56001016	Walalaŵila ati tuliŵesiŵile ŵaLesa ; sombi kumilimo yaŵo ŵalaŵakana , pakuti ŵakunekasya mumitima , ŵakupulaisya , ŵafinaŋgwa kumilimo yonse iweme .
56002001	Sombi ulukulaŵila ifintu ifyelelwe uŵusambisi uŵukosele ;
56002002	ati aŵalalume aŵakulu ŵekale ŵakuŵulo'kunwe'mfaina , ŵamucinsi , ŵamilaŋgwe yamano , ŵakosele mukucetekela namuŵutemwe namumitimanteka ;
56002003	ati aŵanakasi aŵakote naŵo ŵaŵe nemekalilo amucinsi , ŵakuŵulo'kusensa aŵaŵyaŵo neli kutekwa kumfaina isinji , ŵakusambisye'fiweme ;
56002004	ati ŵakafunde aŵanakasi aŵanice ukutemwa aŵalume ŵaŵo , nekutemwa neŵana ŵaŵo ,
56002005	nekwikala nemilaŋgwe yamano , ŵaswetele , ŵakucite'milimo pamaŋanda paŵo , ŵaŋkumbu , ŵakutumwa kuŵalume ŵaŵo aŵene , liiŋgesa-kucoŵolwa Isiwi lyaŵaLesa .
56002006	Neŵasaŋkwa naŵo fyopele'fyo ukaŵacenjesye ati ŵekale nemilaŋgwe yamano .
56002007	Mufintu fyonse ulukulibwenesya kesiŵilo kamilimo iweme ; muŵusambisi ulukubwenesya ukusweta , nemucinsi ,
56002008	nekulaŵila ukukosele ukuweme ukutakusininwa ; ati uyo , uli paŵakuleŋgulula akaŵe nensoni , pakuti pakuŵule'cintu iciŵipile neli cimo icakutulaŵisya .
56002009	Aŵasya ŋgaŵalukukomekwa kuli ŵawisikuluŵo aŵene , nekulukuŵatemwesya mufintu fyonse ; ŵakuŵulo'kuleŋgulula ,
56002010	ŵakuŵulo'kwiŵa , sombi ŵakubwenesya ukucetekelwa konse ukuweme ; ati ŵakaŵuletele'milemyo uŵusambisi bwaŵaLesa aŵakutupulusya mufintu fyonse .
56002011	Pakuti uluse lwaŵaLesa lwaŵoneka , ukulukuŵaletela aŵantu ŵonse ukupuluka ,
56002012	nekutufunda ati , pakukana ukupufya-ŵaLesa nekukumbwa ukwamucalo capansi , ukwelelwa twikale wamilaŋgwe yamano , waluŋgeme , ŵakupala-ŵaLesa pampindi ino iyaŵukumo ;
56002013	ili tupembelele ulucetekelo ulucindeme nekuŵoneka kwaŵuleme bwaŵaLesa ŵesu aŵakulu ebwaŵakutupulusya ŵaYesu Klistu ;
56002014	aŵaliposele pakuti pali fweŵo , ati ŵakatuluŵule fweŵo kukusendama konse , nekuliswesesya aŵantu aŵakwikala ŵuŵoni bwaŵo , aŵakukonsyo'kucite'fiweme .
56002015	Ulukulaŵile'fintu ifyo , nekulukucenjesya nekupatila neŵukulu ŵonse . Ŵekakupufya aŵantu ŵonse neli umo .
56003001	Ulukuwalaŋgulusya ati ŵakomekwe kuŵufumu nakuŵukulu , ŵaŵe necumfwilo , ŵakulukupembelele imilimo yonse iweme ;
56003002	ati tekucoŵolo'muntu neli umo , neli kulwa , ati ŵalukwikala neŋkumbu , nekulukubwenesya ukutekanya konse kuŵantu ŵonse .
56003003	Pakuti nafweŵo akale twalitumpile , ŵakuŵulo'kumfwa , ŵakutumpaikwa , ŵakulukupyunjila ukukumbwa nefyatuseko ifinji , ŵakulukwikala mufiŵipile nefikani ŵakukanaminwa , ŵakufitilwansyanya .
56003004	Sombi ili syabwenekele iŋkumbu syaŵaLesa aŵakutupulusya nekutemwa kwaŵo ukwakuŵantu ,
56003005	tekumilimo iyamukuluŋgama , iyi twacitile fweŵene , koku , sombi koti niŋkumbu syaŵo , ŵalitupulwisye pakuti pakusamfya kwakufyalwa liŵili nekuŵusya kwaMupasi Uswetelele ,
56003006	uyo ŵaitile pali fweŵo neŵupe , pakuti pali ŵaYesu Klistu aŵakutupulusya ;
56003007	ati , pakulunjikwa kuluse lwaŵo , tukaŵe nimpyani koti lucetekelo lwamweo wamuyayaya .
56003008	Isiwi ili lyakucetekelwa ; popele ifyafintu ifyo ndukufwaya ati ulukusipula makosa , ati aŵo aŵacetekele kuli ŵaLesa ŵakalukuŵamba mumitima ukulukulame'milimo iweme . Ifyo-fintu filiweme fyesyuko kuŵantu .
56003009	Sombi ulukusesya ifyakwipusya ifitumpile nefyafitentekwa neluŵo nefyakutosya ifyapamafunde ; pakuti fyo fyesyamo fyalukoso .
56003010	Umuntu uwakusambisye'fisendeme , pakumucenjesya limo naliŵili , umuleke ;
56003011	pakuti pakwisiŵa ati uwakuŵe' fyo alikoŋkomene mumutima , nekulukuŵifya ukulukulisinina .
56003012	Ili ŋkakutumina Atema kani Tuciko , ukesye makosa ukwisa kuli neŵo kuNikopoli ; pakuti ndilandicile ati ŋkekala uko umwela .
56003013	Ukaŵasindicisye nemuŋkonsya Sena uwamafunde naApolo , wekapeŋgela neli kantu .
56003014	Neŵantu ŵesu naŵo ŋgaŵakasambile ukulukulama imilimo iweme pakuti pakupeŋga ukwacine , weŋgawa nekuŵule'fisepo .
56003015	Ŵalukukusekela ŵonse aŵo aŵa ndi naŵo . Ukaŵasekele aŵo aŵalukututemwa mukucetekela . Uluse Iwikale nenu mwense . Ameni .
57001001	NePaulu , nekaili waŵaKlistu Yesu , naTimote umukwasu , tulukukulembela Filemoni ututemenwe , wemupyunjisi umuŵyesu ,
57001002	naAfya iŋkasi yesu , naAlicipo umusilikani umuŵyesu , nekelesya ilili muŋanda yoŵe .
57001003	Uluse Iwikale nenu neŵutende ubwakufuma kuli ŵaLesa ŵaWisifwe nakuli ŵaSikulu Yesu Klistu .
57001004	Ndatota ŵaLesa ŵanji insiku syonse , ili ŋkulaŋguluka pamatembelo anji ,
57001005	pakumfwa ifyaŵutemwe ŵoŵe nekucetekela uko uku uli nako ukwakuli ŵaSikulu Yesu , nakuŵaluŋgeme ŵonse ;
57001006	ati ukwambala kwakucetekela koŵe kukaŵe nekusantuka mukwisiŵa ifintu fyonse ifiweme ifili muli weŵo , ifyakuli ŵaKlistu Yesu .
57001007	Pakuti naliŵele nekusemba nekusaŋgalasiwa ukwinji muŵutemwe ŵoŵe , pakuti imitima yaŵaluŋgeme yalikatulucile pakuti pali weŵo , wemukwasu .
57001008	Pakuti pali fyefyo , naŋgawa ati ndi nelupata lonse muli ŵaKlistu ulwakukuŵule'fyo ifyelelwe ukucita .
57001009	Naŋgawe' fyo pakuti paŵutemwe ndukukukombetela tanje cine , pakuti ninePaulu umucekulu , ŵukumo kaŵili ndi kaili waŵaKlistu Yesu .
57001010	Ndukukukombetela pakuti pamwana wanji , Onesimo , unafyele muli ŵukaili bwanji ,
57001011	uwali walukoso kuli weŵo akale ; sombi ŵukumo alielelwe weŵo naneŵo ,
57001012	unabwesesya kuli weŵo umwine , ekweŵa mutima wanji nemwine .
57001013	Icine nalukufwaya ati ekale naneŵo , ati pakuti pali weŵo ŋgaampyunjile muli ŵukaili bwaCeŵo Iciweme ;
57001014	sombi apakuŵulo'kusumina koŵe nsifwaile-po ukucita neli kantu ; ati ukuwama koŵe tekwikala koti kwakupanjilwa , sombi ati kukekale koti mutima woŵe .
57001015	Pakuti cipale alilekanisiwe naweŵo impindi imbi pakuti pali fifi , ati ukalukuli nakwe impindi yonse iyamuyayaya ;
57001016	tekoti nikalume ŵukumo , sombi koti muntu ucilile napali kalume , mukwasu utemenwe ukwakuti kuli neŵo , sombi tanje cine kuli weŵo , namumunefu namuli ŵaSikulu .
57001017	Kani lomba ulukuŋgewa ati muŵyoŵe , ukamupokelele koti nineŵo nemwine .
57001018	Sombi kani alikuŵifisye icintu , kani ali nemwapu , ukeŵe ati mulandu wanji .
57001019	NePaulu ndukufilemba kuminwe yanji nemwine , ŋkaufuta : ( apa niŋgewa ati naweŵo ati uli nemwapu kuli neŵo uwabwine ŵoŵe kaŵili . )
57001020	Icine , wemukwasu , ŋgaŋkusembele muli ŵaSikulu ; ukakatulusye umutima wanji muli ŵaKlistu .
57001021	Pakucetekela mukumfwisya koŵe , ndukukulembela ; pakuti ndiisi ati ukacita ifyakucila napali fyefyo ifi ndukulaŵila .
57001022	Sombi kaŵili ulukunansicila neŵo umwakwikala ; pakuti ndukucetekela ati ŋkapelwe kuli mweŵo , pakuti pakutembela kwenu .
57001023	Epafila , kaili umuŵyanji uwamuli ŵaKlistu Yesu , alukukusekela ,
57001024	naMako naAlisitako naDema naLuku , aŵaŵyanji aŵamumilimo , fyopele'fyo .
57001025	Uluse lwaŵaSikulu ŵesu Yesu Klistu Iwikale nemupasi wenu . Ameni .
58001001	Akale ŵaLesa ŵalukulaŵila kuli ŵawisifwe muŵakusimika pantu apenji nekwambala ukwamikoka iinji ,
58001002	popele apapelele insiku isi ŵalilaŵile kuli fweŵo muWana ŵaŵo , aŵo ŵaikalicile nimpyani yafintu fyonse , kuli ŵo kaŵili eko ŵacitile impindi syamuyayaya .
58001003	Aŵo ekutula kwaŵuleme bwaŵo , cipasyo caŵuntu bwaŵo ; ŵalipintile ifintu fyonse kwisiwi lyamakosa aŵo ; popele , ili ŵaswesesye ifyakuŵifya , ŵaliikele palwine lwaŴukulu kwiulu ;
58001004	ili ŵaweme ukwakucilo'kwakuti napaŋkalamba , koti nifyopele'fyo ifi ŵapyene isina ilyakusicilo' kwakuti uŵuleme .
58001005	Pakuti kuli isa-ŋkalamba ŵalaŵile pambi ati : Ŵeŵo uli Mwana wanji , Nakufyala weŵo lelo ? nakaŵili ati : Neŵo ŋkalukuli nineŵa Wisi , Naye akalukuli Mwana wanji ?
58001006	Kaŵili pakweŵa impindi iyo iyi ŵakenjisya-mo mucalo caŵantu uyo umuŵele , ŵalilaŵile ati : Kaŵili ŋgasimulambile iŋkalamba syaŵaLesa syonse .
58001007	Nefyaŋkalamba nasyo ŵalilaŵile ati : Uyo eusyalula iŋkalamba syakwe fipupu , Neŵapyunjisi ŵakwe naŵo kwakaka kwamulilo .
58001008	Sombi ifyaMwana ŵalilaŵile ati : Iteŵe lyoŵe weLesa , lyakwikalilila insiku syonse isyamuyayaya ; Nekasako kakuluŋgama nako kasako kaŴufumu ŵoŵe .
58001009	Walukutemwa ukuluŋgama , nekulukufitilwa ukusendama . Pakuti pali fyefyo ŵaLesa , eŵaLesa ŵoŵe , ŵalikusufisye nemafuta Akusembo'kwakuti ukwakucila napaŵaŵyoŵe .
58001010	Nakaŵili ati : Weŵo , weSikulu , pakutaŋga waliikalicile amakosa icalo ; Nemaulu nao milimo iyakuminwe yoŵe .
58001011	Ifyo fikafwa , sombi weŵo ulekalilila : Fyonse'fyo fikacekula koti cakufwala :
58001012	Nakaŵili koti cakufwalila-po ukafifuŋga : Koti cakufwala fikatantakwa kaŵili : Sombi weŵo ewewopele , Nemyaka yoŵe nayo taikasila-po , yo .
58001013	Sombi ifyaisa-ŋkalamba ŵalaŵile pambi ati : Ikala palwine lwanji , Ili nsiŋgatwalula utupondo toŵe cipuna icakusamina-po amakasa oŵe ?
58001014	Syonse kansi tasili mipasi ilukupyuŋga , iyatumwa mukucite'milimo pakuti pali ŵaŵo aŵali apepi ukupyana ukupuluka ?
58002001	Pakuti pali fyefyo ukwelelwa fweŵo ukulukufikuticisya ukucila ifintu ifyo ifi twaumfwile , twiŋgesa cipale kutwalwa .
58002002	Pakuti kani isiwi ilyalaŵilwe kuŋkalamba lyalikacilwe , nekupulaisya nekukano'kumfwa konse nekupoka umulandu uwelelwe ;
58002003	tukapuluke syani , kani tupufye ukupuluka ukukulu ukwakuŵe'fyo ? Uko , pakutaŋgo'kulawilwa kuli ŵaSikulu , kwalikosiwe pali fweŵo kuli ŵaŵo aŵaumfwile .
58002004	NaŵaLesa naŵo ŵaliŵacitile ŵumboni pamo netwisiŵilo nefyakukaŋkamana nemakosa amikoka namikoka nakukupelaika kwaMupasi Uswetelele koti kufwaya kwaŵo .
58002005	Pakuti taŵakomekele kuŋkalamba icalo caŵantu icikesa , ici tulukweŵa .
58002006	Sombi umbi alisimicile pambi ati : Mbomuntunsi ninani ati mumulaŋguluke ? Neli mwana wamuntunsi ninani ati mwise mukumuŵona ?
58002007	Mwalimwikalicile nekwikala ukucepele panini napali koko ukŵaŋkalamba ; Mwalimufwicile nemuntinya waŵuleme nekucindikwa , Nekumwikalika neŵukulu peulu pamilimo iyakuminwe yenu :
58002008	Mwalikomekele ifintu fyonse pansi yamakasa akwe . Pakuti , pakukomeka ifintu fyonse kuli ye , taŵasile-po neli kantu akatakakomekelwe kuli ye . Sombi ŵukumo tatuŋgaŵona ifintu fyonse ukukomekwa kuli ye .
58002009	Sombi tulukuŵaŵona ŵa Yesu , aŵaikalicilwe nekwikala ukucepele panini napali koko ukŵaŋkalamba , pakuti pakusomenwa kwamfwa , ŵafwikwa nemuntinya waŵuleme nekucindikwa , ati koti luse lwaŵaLesa ŵakaŵomfwile imfwa aŵantu ŵonse .
58002010	Pakuti aŵo , pakuti pali ŵo epo fili ifintu fyonse , muli ŵo namo emo fili fyonse , pakuŵafisya kuŵuleme aŵana aŵenji , fyaliŵelelwe ukuciwaminisya mufyakusomena icilolo icakupuluka kwaŵo .
58002011	Pakuti aŵo aŵaswesya naŵaŵo aŵaswesiwa ŵonse ŵali ŵamo : pakuti pali fyefyo taŵakwete-nsoni pakuŵelika ati ŵakwasu ,
58002012	nekulaŵila ati : Ŋkatulisya lsina lyenu kuŵakwasu , Mukati mwikelesya ŋkemba mukumucindikeni .
58002013	Kaŵili ati : Ŋkapema-mo muli ye . Nakaŵili ati : Ŵoneni , nineŵo neŵana aŵa ŵampele ŵaLesa .
58002014	Popele pakuti aŵana ŵaliaŵanicile kumunefu nakumilopa , naŵo kaŵili ŵaliaŵanicile naŵo ifyo fyopele ; ati pakufwa ŵakamwalule walukoso uyo uwali neŵukulu bwamfwa , emusensesi ;
58002015	ŵaŵakakulule ŵonse aŵo aŵakacilwe kuli ŵukalume imyeo yaŵo yonse kukutina kwamfwa .
58002016	Pakuti icine taŵasiikata neli panini iŋkalamba , sombi ŵalekata aŵana ŵakwe Ablaamu .
58002017	Pakuti pali fyefyo fyaliŵelelwe ukupalana neŵakwaŵo mufintu fyonse , ati ŵakaŵe mupapatilisi umukulu , uwaŋkumbu , uwakucetekelwa mufintu ifyakuli ŵaLesa , mukufuta imilandu yafyakuŵifya fyaŵantu .
58002018	Pakuti aŵene ŵalisomenwe pakwesiwa , pakuti pali fyefyo ŵaliisi ukuŵofwa-ko aŵo aŵalukwesiwa .
58003001	Pakuti pali fyefyo , mweŵakwasu mweŵaswetelele , mwemwaŵanicile kukwita ukwakwiulu , laŋgulukeni Intanjisi , Umupapatilisi Umukulu uwakusuminina kwesu , eŵa Yesu ;
58003002	aŵacetekelwe kuli ŵaŵo aŵaŵekalicile , koti nifyopele'fyo ifi acetekelwe Mose monse muŋanda yaŵo .
58003003	Pakuti ŵalieŵelwe ati ŵelelwe uŵuleme ubwakucilo'bwinji napali Mose , koti nifyopele'fyo ifi ali nekucindikwa uyo uwaiŵeke iŋanda ukwakucilo'bwinji napananda iine .
58003004	Pakuti iŋanda syonse silewakwa kuli umbi ; sombi aŵaiŵeke ifintu fyonse niŵaLesa .
58003005	Kaŵili Mose icine walicetekelwe monse muŋanda yaŵo koti mupyunjisi , mukuŵa nimboni yafyefyo-fintu ifikesa-kulaŵilwa .
58003006	Sombi ŵaKlistu ŵalicetekelwe ukwikalika iŋanda yaŵo koti mwana : nafweŵo tuli niŋanda yaŵo , kani tulukwikatisya ulupata Iwesu nekulitota kwalucetekelo Iwesu ukufika nakukupela-ko .
58003007	Pakuti pali fyefyo , koti nifyopele' fyo ifi ulaŵila Umupasi Uswetelele , ati :
58003008	Lelo kani mwakumfwe'siwi lyaŵo , Tekukosye'mitima yenu , koti nipampindi iŵaŵakalipisye ŵaLesa , Koti nipakasuŵa kakwesya ukwamumpaŋga ,
58003009	Uko uku ŵaŋgesesye ŵawisinwe , pakunsalala , Nekuŵone'milimo yanji imyaka amakumi ane .
58003010	Pakuti pali fyefyo nalifitilwe icitentekwa ico , Nekulaŵila ati : Ŵalaŵifya insiku syonse mumitima yaŵo : Sombi taŵesiŵile insila syanji .
58003011	Koti nifyopele'fyo ifi nalapile muŵukali bwanji , ati : Taŵakenjila mukutusya kwanji !
58003012	Cenjeleni , mweŵakwasu , wiŋgesakwikala cipale muli umbi uwapali mweŵo umutima uŵipile uwakukanika , pakuŵaalucila ŵaLesa ŵaMweo :
58003013	sombi kamucenjesyansyanya insiku nansiku , ili paciilicilwe ati nilelo ; eŋgesa-kukesiwa kukutumpaika kwakuŵifya umbi uwapali mweŵo .
58003014	Pakuti tuliŵele ŵakwaŵana naŵaKlistu , kani tulukwikatisya makosa ukutatika kwakucetekela kwesu ukufika nakukupela-ko ;
58003015	ili pacilaŵilwa ati : Lelo , kani mwakumfwe'siwi lyaŵo , Tekukosye'mitima yenu , koti nipampindi iŵaŵakalipisye ŵaLesa .
58003016	Pakuti , mbaniŵani aŵakalipisye , ili ŵaumfwile ? Kansi teŵaŵo ŵonse aŵafumine mu'Ijipiti aŵatanjililwe kuli Mose ?
58003017	Kaŵili mbaniŵani aŵo ŵafitilwe imyaka amakumi ane ? Teŵaŵo aŵaŵifisye , aŵo ifisa fyaŵo efyawile mumpaŋga ?
58003018	Kaŵili mbanikuli ŵani ŵalapile ati tamukenjila mukutusya kwanji , kani tekuli ŵaŵo aŵapulaisye ?
58003019	Popele tulukuŵona ati taŵaisiŵile ukwinjila pakuti pakukanika .
58004001	Ŋgatulukutina lomba , eŋgesa-kuwoneka cipale umbi uwapali mweŵo ati apelela , naŋgawa ati kwasyala ukulaya ukwakwinjila mukutusya kwaŵo .
58004002	Pakuti icine twaliŵulisisiwe leeŵo leiweme , koti nifyopele'fyo naŵaŵo : sombi isiwi lyakumfwa talyaŵasyucisye ŵo , pakuti tawasaŋkene mukucetekela pamo naŵaŵo aŵaumfwilisye .
58004003	Pakuti fweŵo , fwetucetekela , tulukwinjila mukutusyo' ko , koti nifyopele'fyo ifi ŵalaŵile ati : Koti nifyopele'fyo ifi nalapile muŵukali bwanji , ati : Taŵakenjila mukutusya kwanji ! Naŋgawa ati imilimo yalicitilwe ukufuma kukuleŋgwa kwacalo .
58004004	Pakuti ŵalilaŵile pambi ifyansiku yaŵusisanu nasiŵili ifyakuŵe'fi ati : Popele ŵaLesa ŵalitusisye pansiku yaŵusisanu nasiŵili ukuleke'milimo yaŵo yonse ;
58004005	napantu pano kaŵili ati : Taŵakenjila mukutusya kwanji !
58004006	Popele pakuti palisyele ati ŵambi ŵakenjile-mo , napakuti aŵo aŵaŵulisisiwe leeŵo leiweme akale taŵainjile-mo pakuti pakupulaisya ,
58004007	ŵalilembele liŵili akasuŵa kambi , ili ŵalaŵile muli Dafidi ati , Lelo , pakupite'mpindi itali iyakuŵe' fyo , koti nifyopele'fyo ifi palaŵilwe akale , ati : Lelo , kani mwakumfwe'siwi lyaŵo , Tekukosye'mitima yenu .
58004008	Pakuti ŋga aŵapele ukutusya Josyua , ŋga taalaŵile pantanjile ifyakasuŵa kambi .
58004009	Paliŵasyalile lomba aŵantu ŵaŵaLesa ukutusya kwasabata .
58004010	Pakuti uyo uwainjile mukutusya kwaŵo , alitusisye kaŵili kumilimo yakwe , koti nifyopele'fyo ifi ŵatusisye ŵaLesa nakumilimo yaŵo aŵene .
58004011	Ŋgatwesye makosa lomba ukwinjila mukutusyo'ko , ŵeŋgesa-kuwila aŵantu ŵonse neli umo munsila intu imo iyakupulaisya .
58004012	Pakuti isiwi lyaŵaLesa lili nemweo , lilasantuka , lilitwile ukwakucila napampoko syonse isipinika kuŵili , lilapula ukwakulekanya umutima nemupasi , nemalundo nemafuta amumafupa , lili nemano akupulililo' kwisiŵa amalaŋgulusi nekulandakanya konse ukwamumutima .
58004013	Kaŵili tapali-po icintu icileŋgelwe icitacibwenekele pamenso aŵo ; sombi ifintu fyonse fili apaswetele lukoso , filifisulucile pamenso aŵaŵo aŵo tuli naŵo nemulandu .
58004014	Lomba pakuti tuli nemupapatilisi umukulu uwaŵuleme , uwapitile mumaulu , ŵaYesu Umwana waŵaLesa , ŋgatulukwikatisya ukusuminina kwesu .
58004015	Pakuti tatukwete umupapatilisi umukulu utesi ukumfwana nafweŵo mukunaka kwesu , sombi waliesesiwe mufintu fyonse koti nifyopele'fyo nafweŵo , sombi taaŵifisye , yo .
58004016	Ŋgatupalamine lomba nemitima yalupata kwiteŵe lyaluse , ati tupoke iŋkumbu nekuŵono'luse ulwakutofwa-ko pampindi yakupeŋga kwesu .
58005001	Pakuti aŵapapatilisi aŵakulu ŵonse , uwafumisiwe paŵantu alekalikwa pakuti paŵantu ifyafintu ifyakuli ŵaLesa , ati akapose nempese nemilambu iyakwipaya pakuti pafyakuŵifya ,
58005002	umuntu uŋgawomfwile'nsoni awantu aŵakuŵula' mano neŵakupasucila-mo , pakuti ye umwine alisiŋgulucilwe nekunaka ;
58005003	kaŵili , pakuti pali fyefyo , alielelwe ukupose' milambu pafyakuŵifya ifyakwe umwine , koti nifyopele'fyo nefyaŵantu .
58005004	Kaŵili tapali-po umuntu ulipokela ukucindama uko , sombi alapoka pakwitwa kuli ŵaLesa , koti nifyefyo ifi ali Aloni .
58005005	Fyopele'fyo naŵaKlistu taŵalilemesye mukuŵa mupapatilisi umukulu , sombi niŵaŵo aŵalaŵile kuli ŵo ati : Weŵo uli Mwana wanji , Nakufyala weŵo lelo :
58005006	koti nifyopele'fyo ifi ŵalaŵile pambi ati : Weŵo ewemupapatilisi wamuyayaya Mukukoŋkana kwacikoto cakwe Melecisedeci .
58005007	Aŵo , pansiku syaŵuntunsi bwaŵo , ili ŵatembele nekulukulomba nekulila ukukosele neminsosi kuli ŵaŵo aŵaisiŵile ukuŵapulusya kumfwa , nekumfwika pakuti pakutonda-ŵaLesa kwaŵo ,
58005008	naŋgaŵa ati Mwana , ŵalisambile ukumfwisya kufintu ifyo ifi ŵakululucile-mo ;
58005009	popele pakuwaminina ŵaliŵele wakuwaleŋgela ukupuluka ukwamuyayaya ŵonse aŵaŵomfwisya ;
58005010	ŵaliilicilwe kuli ŵaLesa ati mupapapatilisi umukulu mukukoŋkana kwacikoto cakwe Melecisedeci .
58005011	Ifyakuli fyefyo tuli nefintu ifinji ifyakulaŵila ifikatesye ukuŵulisisya , pakuti muliŵele neŵufila ubwakumfwa .
58005012	Pakuti , ili mwelelwe ukwikala ŵasambisi pakuti pampindi , mulukupeŋgela liŵili uwakumusambisyeni ifyakutatika ifipuŵile ifyakusimika kwaŵaLesa ; muliŵele ŵakufwaya'mandili , tamuli ŵakufwaya ifyakulya ifikosele , koku .
58005013	Pakuti aŵantu ŵonse , ulukoŋka amandili , tesiŵile isiwi lyakuluŋgama ; pakuti lucece .
58005014	Sombi ifyakulya ifikosele fyaŵantu aŵakulu , aŵo amano aŵo casambile pakuti pakwikala kwaŵo ukulukulekanya ifiweme nefiŵipile .
58006001	Pakuti pali fyefyo , tufume-po pesiwi lyakutatike'fintu fyaŵaKlistu , twendesye mukufika kukuwaminina ; ili tuleko'kwiŵaka liŵili ifyapansi ifyakwaluka ukuleke'milimo ifwile , nefyakucetekela ukwakuli ŵaLesa ,
58006002	neŵusambisi bwaŵuŵatisyo , nefyakutintila-po iminwe , nekuŵuka kwaŵafwile , nekusininwa ukwamuyayaya .
58006003	Efyo tukacita , kani ŵasumine ŵaLesa .
58006004	Pakuti ifyaŵaŵo aŵatufisiwe akale , nekuyumfwa impese iyakwiulu , nekulukwaŵanisiwa Umupasi Uswetelele ,
58006005	nekulyumfwa isiwi lyaŵaLesa iliweme , nemakosa ampindi ikesa ,
58006006	popele nekupasuka-ko , aŵo filakaŋga ukuŵaŵusya liŵili ukulukulapila ; pakuti ŵalukulitalicila liŵili Aŵana ŵaŵaLesa , nekuwapufya apaswetele .
58006007	Pakuti icalo ico , icanwine imfula iisa pali co liŵili liŵili , icimesya imbuto isyelelwe aŵo , pakuti pali ŵo epo ciliminwa kaŵili , cilapoka kuli ŵaLesa ukusyuka :
58006008	sombi kani cimesye imyuŋga nefisosolo , cilakanwa nekupalamina kukufiŋgwa ; ukupela-ko kwacico kociwa .
58006009	Sombi , mwetutemenwe , tulukucetekela ifyakuli mweŵo ificilile ukuwama , ifintu ifili nekupuluka , naŋgawa ati tulukulaŵile'fyo :
58006010	pakuti ŵaLesa taŵasendeme ukulukuluŵa-ko imilimo yenu , neŵutemwe uŵo uŵu mwabwenesye ubwakwisina lyaŵo , ili mwapyunjile awaluŋgeme , nekulukuŵapyunjila naŵukumo .
58006011	Kaŵili tulukufwaya ati mweŵo mwense mukalukubwenesya umuŋkonsya wopele ukulukukumanisya ulucetekelo ukufika nakukupela-ko :
58006012	ati tamukalukuli neŵufila , sombi ati mukalukuŵatenteka aŵo aŵalukupyana amalailo pakuti pakucetekela nemutimanteka .
58006013	Pakuti , ili ŵamulaile Ablaamu ŵaLesa , pakuti taŵali naumbi uwakulapa ucilile uŵukulu , ŵalililapile ,
58006014	nekulaŵila ati : Icinenene ukusyucisya ŋkakusyucisya , nekufusya nako ŋkakufusya .
58006015	Popele fyopele'fyo , pakulukukoselela nemutimanteka alipokele ilayano .
58006016	Pakuti aŵantu ŵalalapo'wacilile uwukulu ; kaŵili , pakupicisya kwaŵo konse , ukulapa ecakupela-ko icakwikalika iceŵo .
58006017	Popele ŵaLcsa , pakuti ŵalukufwayo' kusilanjisya ukwakucila impyani isyelayano ukuŵulo'kwaluka kwakulandicila kwaŵo , ŵaliletele pakati icilapo ;
58006018	ati , pakuti pafintu fiŵili ifitafyaluka , ifitesi ukuŵepa-mo ŵaLesa , tukaŵe nekusaŋgalala ukukosele , fwetwaŵutucile-ko mukwikata ulucetekelo ululi pamenso esu ,
58006019	ulu tuli nalo koti cakwimakaniko' bwato icakumutima , ulwikalicilwe , ulukosele , ulwakwinjila namucipembe .
58006020	Mopele umo ŵaYesu koti musoŵelesya eŵatwinjilile , ili ŵaŵele mupapatilisi umukulu uwamuyayaya mukukoŋkana kwacikoto cakwe Melecisedeci .
58007001	Pakuti uyo-Melecisedeci , imfumu yaSalemi , umupapatilisi waŵaLesa Aŵo Aŵacilile , walikumene naAblaamu , pakubwela Ablaamu ili asilile ukusiipaye' mfumu , nekumusyucisya .
58007002	Naye Ablaamu alimwaŵile pamakumi onse cimo cimo pafintu fyonse : ( isina lyakwe , pakwaluka , tanje niMfumu yakuluŋgama , popele nakaŵili niMfumu yaSalemi , ilyakweŵa ati — niMfumu yaWutende .
58007003	Tawali naŵawisi , neli niŵanyina neli citentekwa ici afyalilwe-mo ; insiku syakwe tasyali nekutatika , nemweo wakwe nawo tawapelele ; sombi alipalanisiwe koti Mwana waŵaLesa ; ) uyo-Melecisedeci alekalilila mupapatilisi insiku pee .
58007004	Popele alakanyeni uŵukulu bwamuntu uyo , uyu apele Ablaamu wisifwe uwakale icakwaŵila cimo pamakumi onse pafyakutapa ifiweme .
58007005	Kaŵili aŵo aŵana ŵakwe Lefai , aŵapoka uŵupapatilisi , ŵalifundilwe ati ŵalukufumya-po pamakumi onse ifyaŵantu cimo cimo koti mafunde , ifyo kweŵa ati fyaŵakwaŵo , naŋgawa ati ŵo ŵalifumine kuluŵunda lwakwe Ablaamu .
58007006	Sombi umuntu , utapendelwa pafitentekwa fyaŵo , alipokele pamakumi onse cimo cimo kuli Ablaamu , nekumusyucisya uyo uwali nemalailo .
58007007	Sombi tapali ukuleŋgulula , icine ucepele uŵuleme eusyucisiwa kuli woyo ucilile uŵuleme .
58007008	Kaŵili apa aŵantu aŵafwa ŵalapoka ifyakufuma pamakumi cimo cimo ; sombi apo umuntu usimicilwe ati alekalilila nemweo eupoka .
58007009	Popele tuliisi ukulaŵila ati muli Ablaamu , Lefai , upoka ifyakufuma pekumi , alipele ifyakufuma pekumi ;
58007010	pakuti acili muluŵunda lwaŵawisi , ili akumene naŵo Melecisedeci .
58007011	Popele kani mwali ukuwaminina muŵupapatilisi bwaŵena-Lefai , ( pakuti aŵantu ŵalipokele amafunde muli ŵoŵo ) , mbacisa-ceŵo cimbi icakwimina umupapatilisi umbi mukukoŋkana kwacikoto cakwe Melecisedeci , nekuŵulo' kwebwa ati nimukukoŋkana kwacikoto cakwe Aloni ?
58007012	Pakuti , pakwaluka uŵupapatilisi , amafunde nao caŋgaaluka .
58007013	Pakuti aŵo , ifyaŵo efyalaŵilwe ifyo-fintu , walisaŋkene neŵamukoka umbi , utoŋgafumyo'muntu neli umo ukulukucite'milimo iyakuconto .
58007014	Pakuti filibwenekele ati ŵaSikulu ŵesu ŵalitulile kuŵena-Juda ; kaŵili ifyamukoka uyo Mose taalaŵile-po neli kantu ifyakuŵupapatilisi .
58007015	Kaŵili filibwenekele ukwakucila ati , koti cipasyo cakwe Melecisedeci , pakema umupapatilisi umbi ,
58007016	uwaleŋgelwe , tekoti lifunde lyakufunda ukwakumunefu , koku , sombi koti makosa amweo uwakuŵulo'kusila :
58007017	pakuti filisimicilwe ati : Weŵo ewemupapatilisi wamuyayaya Mukukoŋkana kwacikoto cakwe Melecisedeci .
58007018	Pakuti icine paliŵele ukuposeka kwefunde ilyatanjile , pakuti pakunaka nekwikala kwalilyo ukwalukoso ,
58007019	( pakuti amafunde taawaminisye ukukonsya neli kantu ) : kaŵili pali ukwinjisya ulucetekelo uluweme ukucila , muli lolo emo tupalamina kuli ŵaLesa .
58007020	Kaŵili tapaŵulile ukulapa ;
58007021	( pakuti aŵo icine waliŵele ŵapapatilisi apakuŵulo'kulapa ; sombi Aŵa ŵaliŵele mupapatilisi nekulapa kuli ŵaŵo aŵalaŵile ifyaŵo ati : WaSikulu ŵalilapile , taŵakaaluka , ati : Weŵoewemupapatilisiwamuyayaya ) ;
58007022	fyopele'fyo ŵaYesu ŵaliŵele niŋkusi yelayano iliweme ukwakucila .
58007023	Naŵaŵo icine ŵaliŵele ŵapapatilisi aŵenji makosa , pakuti imfwa ilaŵakanya ukwikalilila :
58007024	sombi Aŵa , pakuti ŵalekalilila insiku syonse , ŵali neŵupapatilisi ubwakuŵulo'kwaluka .
58007025	Pakuti pali fyefyo kaŵili , ŵaliisi ukuŵapulusye'cinenene aŵo aŵapalamina kuli ŵaLesa muli ŵo , pakuti ŵalekala nemweo insiku syonse mukuwalawilila .
58007026	Pakuti umupapatilisi umukulu uwakuŵe'fyo alitwelelwe , uswetelele , uwakuŵulo'kuŵifya , utuŵile , uwalekene nembifi , uwaŵele nekucila napamaulu ;
58007027	utaakwete umulandu wansiku syonse , koti ŵapapatilisi aŵo aŵakulu , uwakupose'milambu iyakwipaya , tanje pakuti pakuŵifya kwakwe umwine , popele napakuti pali koko ukwaŵantu : pa kuti ifyo alicitile limo , ili aliposele .
58007028	Pakuti ifunde lilaŵekalika aŵantu aŵali nekunaka ati ŵapapatilisi ; sombi isiwi lyakulapa ilyalondele ifunde lilamwikalika Umwana , uwaminine insiku syonse isyamuyayaya .
58008001	Kansi pafintu ifyo ifi tulukulaŵila icicilile uŵukulu nicici , ati : Tuli nemupapatilisi umukulu uwakuŵe'fyo , uwaikele kulwine Iweteŵe lya Ŵukulu ubwakumaulu ,
58008002	umupyunjisi uwamumulenda uswetelele newamwisema lyacine , ili ŵapopele ŵaSikulu , aŵantu ŵaŵa .
58008003	Pakuti aŵapapatilisi ŵonse ŵaliikalicilwe ukulukuposa nempese nemilambu iyakwipaya : pakuti pali fyefyo , ukumwelelwa nawoyo ukulukuli necakuposa .
58008004	Popele ye ŋga ali pacalo , ŋga tekele mupapatilisi neli panini , pakuti epo ŵali aŵapapatilisi aŵakuposa impese koti mafunde ,
58008005	awalukupyuŋga mucipasyo namucinsiŋgwa cafintu ifyakwiulu , koti nifyopele'fyo ifi acenjesiwe Mose , ili ali apepi ukucite'sema ; pakuti ŵalilaŵile ŵaLesa ati : Ŵona ati ukacite ifintu fyonse koti kesiŵilo ako akabwenekele kuli weŵo palupili .
58008006	Sombi naŋgawe'fyo alipokele uŵupyunjisi uŵucilile uŵuleme , pakuti ye niŋkusi yakulayana kumbi ukuweme ukwakucilo'kwakuti , ukwacitilwe pamalailo aweme akucila .
58008007	Pakuti ŋga takwali nemilandu ukulayana uko ukwakutaŋga , ŋga tapafwailwe apakwikala ukwaŵukuŵili .
58008008	Pakuti , pakuwaleŋgulula , ŵalilaŵile ati : ŴaSikulu ati : Ŵoneni , insiku sikesa , Lomba ŋkakonsya ukulayana kwaŵukumo newamuŋanda yaŵaIsilaeli newamuŋanda yaŵaJuda ;
58008009	Tekoti kulayana uku nacitile naŵawisiŵo pakasuŵa ako Naŵekete kuminwe mukuŵafumya mucalo caIjipiti , koku ; Pakuti ŵo ukulukwikala-mo mukulayana kwanji , ŵaŵa ; Naneŵo naliŵapufisye ; efilukulaŵila ŵaSikulu .
58008010	Pakuti ukulayana uko , uku ŋkalayana newamuŋanda yaŵaIsilaeli Pakupite'nsiku isyo , nikuku ; efilukulaŵila ŵaSikulu : Ŋkaŵenjisisya'mafunde anji mumilaŋgwe yaŵo , Napamitima yaŵo napo ŋkaalemba . Kaŵili ŋkalukuli niŵaLesa ŵaŵo , Naŵo ŵakalukuli ŵantu ŵanji .
58008011	Popele ŵonse taŵakasambisya aŵaŵyaŵo aŵamumusi newakwawo ati : Ŵesiŵeni ŵaSikulu , koku ; Pakuti ŵonse ŵakalukunjisiŵile , Neŵacepele neŵacindeme ŵonse .
58008012	Pakuti ŋkalukuli neŋkumbu pafyakusendama fyaŵo , Nefyakuŵifya fyaŵo nefyakupulaisya fyaŵo nafyo nsikafilaŋgulukapo liŵili .
58008013	Pakulaŵila ati Ukulayana kwaŵukumo , ati ŵalialwile ukwakutaŋga ati kwakale . Sombi icintu icilukuŵa cakale nekucekula cili apepi ukusimina .
58009001	Lomba nekulayana kwakutaŋga kwali nefyaŵulilwe ifyakupyuŋga kwamapempelo , nemulenda uswetelele wakuko , uwapapano pansi .
58009002	Pakuti isema lyaliiŵekwe , ilyakutaŋga , ilyali-mo necakuteka-po inyale , netebulu , naŵasiŋkwa ŵaŵumboni : ilyo liliilicilwe ati Mulenda Uswetelele .
58009003	Popele , pakucile'cipembe icaŵufiŵili , pali isema iliilicilwe ati Mulenda Uswetelele swete ,
58009004	ilyali nembale yegolide iyakocela-po ifinuncile bwino , nebokosi lyakulayana ilyasinjilwe ponse ponse igolide , ilyali-mo inoŋgo yegolide iyali namana , nekasako kakwe Aloni akalukusonsa , nemaseleti akulayana .
58009005	Popele peulu lyebokosi ilyo pali ŵakelubi ŵaŵuleme aŵalukusesemucila icifuniko cacifuto . Ifyafintu ifyo tatulukulaŵila ŵukumo cimo cimo .
58009006	Ili fyaansicilwe filya ifyo-fintu , aŵapapatilisi ŵalenjila liŵili liŵili mwisema ilyakutaŋga , ili ŵakonsya ifyakupyuŋga ;
58009007	sombi mwisema lyaŵuaŵili umupapatilisi umukulu weŋka euwinjila-mo , impindi imo pamwaka , apakuŵule'milopa tepo , pakuti alukupose'milopa imilambu pakuti pali ye umwine napakuti pakufuluŋgana kwaŵantu .
58009008	Umupasi Uswetelele walukulanjisye' fi , ati taiŋgawoneka insila iyakuMulenda Uswetelele , ili liciimakene isema lyakutaŋga :
58009009	ifyo kupalana nefyampindi ino ili-ko lelo ; koti nikoko eko kuposwa impese nemilambu iyakwipaya , itaisi ukuwaminisya muli cimaŋga wakwe uyo ulukwiposa ;
58009010	pakuti ifyo fyaliciticile kufyakulya nakufyakunwa nakufyakusamba ifipusene-pusene efyakuŵulwa ifyakumunefu , ifiŵicilwe ili taiŋgafika impindi iyakulunjika .
58009011	Sombi ili ŵaisile ŵaKlistu , umupapatilisi wafintu ifiweme ifyo ifikesa , mwisema ilyo ilicilile uŵukulu nekuwaminina , ilitalyaiŵekwe kuminwe , ifyo kweŵa ati talyali lyakuleŋgwa uku ,
58009012	ŵaliinjile limo umo umuswetelele , ili ŵabwene ukuluŵula ukwamuyayaya , pakuti pamilopa yambusi neyaŵombe tepo , sombi pakuti pamilopa yaŵo aŵene .
58009013	Pakuti kani imilopa yambusi neyaŵacende nematoi ampwisi , pakusansilwa-po pali ŵaŵo aŵaŵifisiwe , iswesye ukulukutufyo'munefu ,
58009014	tanje cine imilopa yaŵaKlistu , aŵaliposele aŵakuŵulo'mulandu kuli ŵaLesa muMupasi uwamuyayaya , ikatufya ŵacimaŋga ŵenu , ukuleke'milimo ifwile , nekulukupyunjila ŵaLesa ŵaMweo !
58009015	Pakuti pali fyefyo ŵaKlistu niŋkusi iyakulayana kwaŵukumo , ati , pakuŵe'mfwa iyakuluŵula ifyakupulaisya ukulaya ukwakutaŋga , aŵo aŵetilwe ŋgawapoke ukulaya kwaŵupyani ubwamuyayaya .
58009016	Pakuti apali umulawo , epaŋgawe'mfwa yawoyo uwalaile .
58009017	Pakuti umulawo ulikosele pakufwo'muntu ; pakuti kani ulikosele ili aciikele nemweo uyo uwaulaile ?
58009018	Pakuti pali fyefyo nekulayana ukwakutaŋga takwaikalicilwe ukwakuŵule'milopa , yo .
58009019	Pakuti Mose , ili alaŵile amafunde onse kuŵantu ŵonse koti lifunde , aliŵulile imilopa yaŵombe neyambusi pamo nemenda nemasako ambelele akasicile naesobi , nekusansa pebuku iline napaŵantu ŵonse ,
58009020	ili alaŵila ati : Iyi milopa yakulayana uko uku ŵafundile ŵaLesa ukwakuli mweŵo .
58009021	Kaŵili isema nefiŋkoloŋkolo fyonse ifyaŵupyunjisi alifisansile imilopa fyopele'fyo .
58009022	Kaŵili , koti mafunde , niŋgewa ati ifintu fyonse filaswesiwa kumilopa , napakuŵulo'kupokomoke'milopa napo tapali-po ukukakuluka .
58009023	Pakuti pali fyefyo kwalielelwe ati utwisiŵilo twafintu ifyamumaulu tuswesiwe kuli yeyo-milambu ; sombi ifyamwiulu ifine fiŋgaswesiwa kumilambu iyakucilo'ŵuleme napali yeyo .
58009024	Pakuti ŵaKlistu taŵainjile muMulenda Uswetelele uwaiŵekwe kuminwe , akesiŵilo kawoyo uwacine ; sombi ŵaliinjile mwiulu iline , ati ŵaŵoneke ŵukumo pamenso aŵaLesa pakuti pali fweŵo .
58009025	Nakaŵili taŵainjile-mo ati ŵakalukuliposa liŵili liŵili , koti nifyefyo ifi enjila umuswetelele imyaka namyaka umupapatilisi umukulu nemilopa itaili yakwe , tau .
58009026	Kani ifyo tefyo , ŵaKlistu ŋga ŵalisomenwe liŵili liŵili ukufuma kumpindi iyakutatike'calo capansi ; sombi ŵukumo pakupela-ko kwampindi ŵalibwenekele limo mukusimaŋganvo'kuwifya , pakuliposa'ŵene mulambu .
58009027	Popele koti nifyopele'fyo ifyaansicilwe ati aŵantu ŵalukufwa limo , lomba epakusololola ;
58009028	fyopele'fyo naŵaKlistu , ili ŵaposelwe limo mukupinto'kuŵifya kwaŵantu aŵenji , ŵakaŵoneka liŵili , apakuŵulo'kuŵifya , kuli ŵaŵo aŵalukuŵapembelela , ati ŵakaŵapulusye .
58010001	Pakuti ifunde lili necinsiŋgwa cafintu ifiweme ifikesa , talikwete icipasyo copele cafintu ifyo ; popele kumilambu yopele'yo iyi ŵaposa liŵili liŵili imyaka namyaka , taliisi ukuwaminisya aŵo aŵalukupalamina .
58010002	Kani ifyo tefyo ŋga yalilekele ukuposwa , pakuti aŵakupupa , ili ŵaswesesiwe limo , ŋga taŵali nacimaŋga wapafyakuŵifya liŵili .
58010003	Sombi kumilambu iyo kuli ukwanuka-ko kufyakuŵifya imyaka namyaka .
58010004	Pakuti imilopa yaŵacende neyambusi iŋgakaŋga ukufumyo'kuŵifya .
58010005	Pakuti pali fyefyo , ili ŵaisile mucalo capansi , ŵalilaŵile ati : Umulambu uwakwipaya nempese tamwafwaile , Sombi umuŵili mwalinasicile .
58010006	Mumilambu iyakoce'ŵuluŵulu neyapafyakuŵifya tamwasembele-mo .
58010007	Elyo nalaŵile ati : Ŵoneni , naisa ( Mucakupeta icamwibuku mulilembelwe ifyanji ) Ati ŋkacite koti kufwaya kwenu , mweŵaLesa .
58010008	Pakulaŵile'fyo ati : Imilambu iyakwipaya nempese nemilambu iyakoce'ŵuluŵulu neyapafyakuŵifya tamwafwaile neli kusaŋgalalila-mo ( Iombe'yo ilaposwa koti lifunde ) ;
58010009	eli ŵalaŵile ati : Ŵoneni , naisa ati ŋkacite koti kufwaya kwenu , mweŵaLesa . Ŵalukufumya icakutaŋga ati ŵakekalike icaŵufiŵili .
58010010	Kukufwayo'ko tuliswesesiwe , pakuti pakuposwa limo kwamuŵili waŵaYesu Klistu .
58010011	Kaŵili aŵapapatilisi ŵonse ŵalemakana insiku syonse ili wapyuŋga nekulukupose'milambu yopele liŵili liŵili , itaisi neli panini ukufumve'fyakuwifya .
58010012	Sombi ŵo , ili waposelele umulambu umo pakuti pafyakuŵifya , ŵaliikele kulwine lwaŵaLesa ;
58010013	lomba ukufuma kumpindi iyo ŵalipembelele , ili tatuŋgaaluka cipuna icakusamina-po amakasa aŵo utupondo twaŵo .
58010014	Pakuti kukuposa kumo ŵaliŵawaminisye icinenene aŵaswesesiwe .
58010015	Nakaŵili Umupasi Uswetelele ulasimika kuli fweŵo ; pakuti ili walaŵile ati :
58010016	ŴaSikulu ati : Ukulayana uko uku ŋkalayana naŵo pakupita insiku isyo nikuku : Ŋkaŵika'mafunde anji pamitima yawo , Napamilaŋgwe yaŵo napo epo ŋkaalemba ;
58010017	Eli walaŵile ati : Ukuŵifya kwaŵo nekupulaisya kwaŵo tesi ŋkakulaŋguluke-po liŵili , koku .
58010018	Lomba apali ukukakululwa kuli koko , popele apo tapali-po liŵili ukupose'milambu pakuŵifya .
58010019	Lomba , mweŵakwasu , pakuti tuli nemitima yalupata iyakwinjila umuswetelele pakuti pamilopa yaŵaYesu ,
58010020	pansile'yo iyi ŵatwansicilile , iyaŵukumo , iyamweo , iyakupita pacipembe , ico kweŵa ati munefu waŵo ;
58010021	napakuti tuli nemupapatilisi umukulu uwapananda yaŵaLesa ;
58010022	ŋgatupalamine nemitima yacine mukufula kwakucetekela kwesu , ili tusansilwe-po imitima yesu ukufumya-mo wacimaŋga aŵaŵipile , nemiŵili yesu nekusamfiwa mumenda aswetele .
58010023	Ŋgatwikatilile ukufisuluka kwalucetekelo Iwesu nekuwulo'kukaŋkasima , pakuti aŵo aŵalaile wakucetekelwa .
58010024	Kaŵili ŋgatulaŋgulukansyanye , ati tuŵusye uŵutemwe nemilimo iweme ;
58010025	ŋgatuwulo'kuleko'kuwuŋgana , koti nifyefyo ifi ŵacita ŵambi , sombi ŋgatulukucenjesyansyanya ; ukwakucila kaŵili pakuŵona ati akasuŵa kalukupalamina .
58010026	Pakuti kani tuŵifye koti mitima yesu , ili twapokele ukwisiŵa ŵucine , tapasyele-po naŵukumo umulambu uwapakuŵifya ,
58010027	sombi palisyele ukupembelela ukwamenso-menso ukwakupoko'kusinina , neŵukali bwamulilo uŵuli apepi ukuŵalya aŵapate .
58010028	Umuntu uwakupufya ifunde lyakwe Mose alafwa ukwakuwule'ŋkumbu pamboni siŵili kani sitatu .
58010029	Mulukulaŋguluka ati akebwa ati welelwe umulandu wasyani uwakucilo'kusomena , umuntu uwanyantilepo paMwana waŵaLesa , nekweŵa ati cinaŋgwa imilopa iyakulayana iyi aswesesiwe-mo , nekusalula Umupasi waluse ?
58010030	Pakuti tuliŵesi aŵo aŵalaŵile ati : Ukubwesye'milandu kwanji , neŵo eneŋkalambula . Nakaŵili ati : ŴaSikulu eŵakasololola neŵantu ŵaŵo .
58010031	Ukuponena muminwe yaŵaLesa ŵaMweo cakutino'kwakuti .
58010032	Sombi laŋgulukeni insiku syakale , isi mwaumfwile-mo uluŵo ulukulu ulwakusomena , ili mwaŵele nekutuŵa ;
58010033	pambi pakuti mwaliŵele cakutambwa kuŵutambe nakukukululuka , pambi napo pakuti mwaliaŵene naŵaŵo aŵalukwikale'fyo .
58010034	Pakuti mwalukuwaaŋgulwila-ko insoni aŵakacilwe , nekusumina nekusaŋgalala ukutapwa'maŵoni enu , pakuti mwaliisiŵile ati mweŵene muli newuwoni kwiulu ubwakwikalilila ubwakucilo'kuwama .
58010035	Pakuti pali fyefyo tekuposa ulupata Iwenu , ululi nekulambulwa ukukulu .
58010036	Pakuti mulipeŋgele umutimanteka , ati , pakucita koti kufwaya kwaŵaLesa , mukapoke ukulaya .
58010037	Pakuti palisyele impindi inini inini , popele — Uyo ulukwisa akesa , taakakokola , yo .
58010038	Sombi uyo uluŋgeme wanji akalukwikele nemweo kukucetekela : Popele kani anyompakane , umutima wanji totemenwe muli ye .
58010039	Sombi fweŵo tatuli pali ŵaŵo aŵanyompakana ukulukuya kukonalwa , sombi tuli pali ŵaŵo aŵali nekucetekela ukwakupulusyo'mutima .
58011001	Lomba ukucetekela ekwisiŵila kwafintu ififwailwe , emboni yafintu ifitafibwenwe .
58011002	Pakuti mopele umo emo ŵakwatile ŵumboni aŵakulu .
58011003	Kukucetekela eko twisi ati ifyalo fyalificilwe kwisiwi lyaŵaLesa , fyopele'fyo ati ifyo ifiŵonwa tafyaleŋgelwe muli fyefyo ifiŵoneka , tau .
58011004	Kukucetekela eko aposele Ebeli kuli ŵaLesa umulambu uwaminine ukucila napali woyo wakwe Kaini , kuli ko eko akwatile ŵumboni ati ye muntu uluŋgeme , ŵaLesa ili ŵasimika ifyamilambu yakwe ; nakaŵili pakuti pali ko naŋgawa ati alifwile acilaŵila .
58011005	Kukucetekela eko atuntulwilwe kwiulu Enoci eŋgesa-kuwone'mfwa : popele taabwenekele , pakuti ŵaLesa ŵalimutuntulwile ; pakuti , ili taaŋgatuntululwa , alisimicilwe ati wakutemwesya ŵaLesa :
58011006	sombi apakuŵulo'kucetekela tapesiŵa ukuŵatemwesya : pakuti uyo uwakwisa kuli ŵaLesa euŋgacetekela ati epo ŵali , nakaŵili ati ŵo ŵakuŵalambula aŵalukuŵafwaya-fwaya .
58011007	Kukucetekela , Noa , pakucenjesiwa ifyafintu ifitafiŋgawonwa , eko aŵele nekutonda , nekwiŵako'bwato uŵukulu mukupulucila-mo aŵamucisolo cakwe ; kuli fyefyo eko asinine aŵamucalo capansi , nekuŵa nimpyani yakuluŋgama ukwisa kukucetekela .
58011008	Kukucetekela Ablaamu , pakwitwa , eko aumfwile ukufuma mukulukuya kuntu kumbi uko uku akapoka ati ŵupyani ; popele alifumine , uwakuŵulo'kwisiŵo'ko uku alukuya .
58011009	Kukucetekela eko aikele bwensu mucalo icalailwe , koti nimucalo icitacali cakwe nekulukwikele mumasema , pamo naŵalsaci naYakobi , aŵapyene nakwe ukulaya kopele :
58011010	pakuti alipembelele umusi uyo uli nefyakwiŵacila-po uwakwiŵakwa nekucitwa kuli ŵaLesa .
58011011	Kukucetekela naSala umwine eko apokele amakosa akufyalo'mwana , lomba kale acila-po pamyaka iyakufyala ; pakuti aliŵeŵele ati ŵakucetekelwa aŵo aŵalaile .
58011012	Pakuti pali fyefyo kaŵili kumuntu umo , uwali koti ufwile , kwalifumine aŵakuti ubwinji , ukuŵapenda koti tuwaŋgawaŋga utwamwiulu nakoti miseŋga iyakumumba yacisiŵa ŵakuŵulo' kupendeka .
58011013	Aŵo ŵonse ŵalifwile ili ŵacicetekela , lomba taŵaŋgapoka nemalailo ; sombi ŵaliabwene ukutali nekwasekelela , nekusuminina ati nifweŵensu fweŵalwendo pacalo capansi .
58011014	Pakuti aŵo aŵalaŵile'fyakuŵe'fyo ŵalabwenesya ati tulukufwaya-fwaye'calo cakwesu .
58011015	Kaŵili ŋga walukutaŋguluke'calo ico ici ŵafumine-mo , ŋga ŵaliŵele nembwelelelo .
58011016	Sombi ŵukumo ŵalukufwaye'calo icicilile ukuwama , ecakwiulu . Pakuti pali fyefyo ŵaLesa taŵalukuŵomfwila insoni , pakwilikwa ati niŵaLesa ŵaŵo : pakuti ŵaliŵaansicilile limo umusi .
58011017	Kukucetekela Ablaamu , pakwesiwa , eko amuposele lsaci mulambu ; icine , uyo , uwapokelele amalailo , walukuposo'mwana wakwe ufyelwe eŋka :
58011018	naŋgaŵa ati kwalilaŵilwe kuli ye ati : Muli lsaci emo wakebwa ŵakamufyalwa ŵoŵe :
58011019	pakuti alieŵele ati ŵaLesa ŵali nemakosa akuŵusya napaŵafwile : apo amupokele liŵili koti kupalanya .
58011020	Kukucetekela lsaci eko aŵasyucisye Yakobi naEso ifyafintu ifikesa .
58011021	Kukucetekela Yakobi , pakulukufwa ve , eko aŵasyucisye aŵana aŵalalume ŵakwe Josefi ŵonse ; nekucindika ŵaLesa ili akontamine peulu pamukombo wakwe ,
58011022	Kukucetekela Josefi , pakupalamina ukufwa , eko alaŋgulucile nekusimika ukufuma kwaŵana ŵakwe Isilaeli , nekuŵafunda aŵantu ifyakumafupa akwe .
58011023	Kukucetekela Mose , pakufyalwa , eko afisilwe kuŵamufyele imyensi itatu , pakuti ŵalibwene ati ye mwano'weme ; taŵatinine ifunde lyamfumu .
58011024	Kukucetekela Mose , ili akulile , eko akanine ukwilikwa ati mwana wamwano'mwanakasi wakwe Falo ;
58011025	nekusalulula tanje ukusomenwa pamo neŵantu ŵaŵaLesa ukucila napakwikale'mpindi nefyakutemwa fyakuŵifya ,
58011026	nekulukweŵe'mipufyo yaŵaKlistu ati ŵuŵile uŵucilile napamaŵoni akuIjipiti ; pakuti alitontomekele kukulambulwa .
58011027	Kukucetekela eko alekele Ijipiti , uwakuŵulo'kutino' ŵukali bwamfumu : pakuti alikoselele koti wakuŵona'ŵo aŵataŵaŵonwa .
58011028	Kukucetekela eko acitile umuciluko , nekusansa kwamilopa , eŋgesa-kuwakuma-ko uyo uwalukwipaya aŵana ŵonse aŵaŵele .
58011029	Kukucetekela eko ŵaaŵucile leisiŵa leikasicile koti nipamutunta apomine : sombi aŵaIjipiti , pakwesya ukucite'fyo , ŵalimininwe .
58011030	Kukucetekela eko awilile pansi amaliŋga akuJeliko , pakwasiŋguluka insiku sisanu nasiŵili .
58011031	Kukucetekela eko aŵulile ukonalwa pamo neŵakupulaisya Lakabi umucencemesi , pakuti alipokelele neŵutende aŵo aŵalukucete'calo .
58011032	Mbafimbi ndaŵile'ndo ? pakuti impindi yakucepelo'kuŵulisisya ifyaŵaGidyoni naBalaka naSamisoni naYefita ; nefyaŵaDafidi naSamweli neŵakusimika ;
58011033	aŵakomekele uŵufumu kukucetekela , nekulukucito'kuluŋgama , nekukumana nakumalailo nekufuŵatika iŋkalamu ,
58011034	nekusimya makosa amulilo , nekupuluka kumulomo wampoko , nekukosa aŵanacile , nekuŵa nemakosa kuŋkondo , nekuŵutusya amaŵumba afita fyaŵenafyalo .
58011035	Aŵanakasi ŵalipokele aŵafwile ŵaŵo pakuŵuka liŵili : naŵambi naŵo ŵalipuminwe , aŵakuŵulo'kupoko'kupuluka kwaŵo , ati ŵakakumane kukuŵuka pamfwa ukucilile ukuwama .
58011036	Ŵambi kaŵili ŵalipokele ukwesiwa ukwakuŵaseka nemipufyo , nekuŵalupula , nekwakuŵakaka nekwamwikati kaŵili .
58011037	Ŵalipaminwe amabwe , ŵalipandwilwe pakati , ŵaliesiwe , ŵaliipailwe kumpoko ; ŵalukupitana ili ŵafwite ifiseŵa fyambelele nembusi ; walipeŋgele nekukululuka nekucitilwa uŵuŵi ,
58011038	( icalo capansi tacaelelwe ŵo ) , ŵalukupitana mumpaŋga lukoso , napamapili namumaceŋgo namumicembo iyamumusili .
58011039	Popele aŵo ŵonse , aŵasimicilwe pakuti pakucetekela kwaŵo , taŵapokele ifyakulaya ,
58011040	pakuti ŵaLesa ŵaliansicile limo icintu icicilile ukuwama icakuli fweŵo , weŋgawaminina apakuŵula fweŵo .
58012001	Pakuti pali fyefyo , pakuti tulisiŋgulucile nekumbi ilikulu ilyamboni ilyakuŵe'fyo , ŋgatufule ifilemene fyonse nefyakuŵifya ifitusakatila bwaŋgu , ŋgatuwutuke imitimanteka ukwesya ukuli pamenso esu ,
58012002	ili tutontomeka kuli ŵaYesu , awaleŋgele nekukuwaminisya ukucetekela kwesu , aŵasumine umutaliko pakuti pakusaŋgalala ukwali pamenso aŵo , nekupufye'nsoni , nekwikala kulwine lweteŵe lyaŵaLesa .
58012003	Pakuti mulaŋgulukeni uyo uwaumfwile ukuleŋgululansyanya kwambifi ukwakuŵe'fyo , mwiŋgakatala pakulemuka mumitima yenu .
58012004	Tamuŋgacicila ukwakupokomoke' milopa , pakulukulwa nekuŵifya :
58012005	kaŵili muliluŵile-ko ukucenjesyo'ko ukwakwalakanisisya nenu koti nineŵana , ati : Wemwana wanji , wilukupufyo'kupama kwaŵaSikulu , Neli kulemuka pakukaniwa kuli ŵo .
58012006	Pakuti ŵaSikulu ŵalamupamo'yo uyu ŵatemenwe , Nekuŵalupula aŵana ŵonse aŵo aŵa ŵapokele .
58012007	Nikukupamwa eko mukoselela . ŴaLesa ŵalukumuciteni koti ŵana ; pakuti mbawisa-mwana utapamwa kuli ŵawisi ?
58012008	Sombi kani tamukwete ukupamwa , uku ŵapokele ŵonse , lomba muli ŵana ŵaŵusice , tamuli ŵana aŵenenene .
58012009	Nakaŵili twali naŵawisifwe aŵakumunefu aŵakutupama , lomba twaliŵapele umucinsi ; kansi tatukakomekwa tanje cine kuli ŵaWisiŵo imipasi , nekulukwikele nemweo ?
58012010	Pakuti aŵo cine ŵalipamine insiku isice koti kulaŋguluka kwaŵo , sombi ŵaLesa ŵalitupamine mukutusyucisya , ati tukaaŵane ukuswetelela kwaŵo .
58012011	Sombi ukupama konse pampindi yaŵukumo takuŵoneka ati kwakusaŋgalasya , sombi kulaŵoneka ati kwakusomesya ; naŋgawe'fyo pantanjile kulekate'fisepo ifyaŵutende ifyakuluŋgama kuli ŵaŵo aŵasambisiwe-ko .
58012012	Pakuti pali fyefyo , kosyeni amaŵoko aleŵacile nemakufi aŵukumine ;
58012013	kamwaseŵele'nsila isiluŋgeme amakasa enu , ati ico icili cilema tekupasuka-mo sombi ati tanje cine cikakosiwe .
58012014	Kamulondo'ŵutende paŵantu ŵonse , nekusweto'ko uku utaakwete tekuti aŵone ŵaSikulu aŵantu ŵonse neli umo ;
58012015	nekulukuceta eŋgeso'muntu kupelela kuluse lwaŵaLesa ; wiŋgesa-kukatasya umusyu waŵululu , pakumena , lomba neŵenji nekuŵifiwa ;
58012016	eŋgesa-kuwuka umucencemesi , neli wakukowesya , koti niEso , uwaposele uŵupyani bwakwe mukuula akalyo kamo .
58012017	Pakuti muliisi ati pantanjile , ili afwaile ukupyane'syuko , alikenwe ; pakuti taabwene apakulapila , naŋgawa ati alifwaisye neminsosi .
58012018	Pakuti tamupalamine kulupili uluŋgakumwa-ko , ulwakupya mumulilo , nakukufita , nakumfinsi , nakucipupu icantulika ,
58012019	nakukulila kwalupeŋga , nakwisiwi lyakulaŵila , lyopele'lyo aŵo aŵaumfwile ŵalikombetele ati isiwi limbi tekulaŵilwa kuli ŵo ;
58012020	pakuti taŵaisiŵile ukumfwe'fyo ifyafundilwe ati : Kani inama lukoso ikume-ko kulupili , ikepaiwe kumabwe .
58012021	Kaŵili ukuŵoneko'ko kwali kwakutino'kwakuti , fyopele'fyo Mose walilaŵile ati : Ndukutino'kwakuti , nekututuma ,
58012022	Sombi muliisile kulupili lwaSayoni , nakumusi waŵaLesa ŵamweo , Jelusalemi uwakwiulu , nakumaŵumba aŋkalamba mpaŋgana mpaŋgana ,
58012023	nakwiŵumba nekelesya lyaŵana aŵaŵele aŵalembelwe kwiulu , nakuli ŵaLesa aŵakusololola naŵo ŵonse , nakumipasi yawaluŋgeme aŵawaminine ,
58012024	nakuli ŵa Yesu iŋkusi yakulayana kwaŵukumo , nakumilopa iyakusansa ilukulaŵila ukucilo'kuwama napali yeyo iyakwe Ebeli .
58012025	Ŵoneni , tekukano'kumfwa aŵo aŵalaŵila . Pakuti kani taŵapulucile pakukano'kumfwa aŵo aŵaŵacenjesye pacalo capansi , tanje cine fweŵo tesi tupuluke fwetufutatila aŵo aŵakwiulu ;
58012026	aŵo isiwi lyaŵo elyateŋkenye icalo capansi impindi iyo ; sombi ŵukumo ŵalilaile nekulaŵila ati : Naliŵili impindi imo ŋkateŋkanya , tecalo ceŋka koku , sombi neulu .
58012027	Lomba ifyo ati — naliŵili impindi imo-filukulanjisya ukufifumya ifyo ifiteŋkene , koti fintu ificitilwe , ati fikalukwikele ifyo ifitafiteŋkene .
58012028	Pakuti pali fyefyo , pakupoko' ŵufumu uŵutabwisi ukuteŋkana , ŋgatulukwikele neluse , ulwakuŵapyunjila-ko ŵaLesa fweŵo ukwakuŵatemwesya nemucinsi nekutonda .
58012029	Pakuti ŵaLesa ŵesu mulilo ukali .
58013001	Ngabwikale uŵutemwe ubwakuŵakwasu .
58013002	Mwilukuluŵa-ko ukuŵatemwa aŵensu ; pakuti , pakucite' fyo , ŵambi ŵaliteŵetele iŋkalamba syaŵaLesa apakuŵulo'kwisiŵa .
58013003	Ŵalaŋgulukeni aŵakacilwe koti kweŵa ati mulikacilwe pamo naŵo ; naŵaŵo aŵalukucitilwe'fiŵipile , koti kweŵa ati mweŵene muli mumuŵili .
58013004	Ukuupa ŋgakulemiwe kuli ŵo ŵonse , neŵulo naŵo bwikale ŵuswetele ; pakuti aŵacencemesi neŵaŵucende ŵaLesa eŵakasololola naŵo .
58013005	Mwikale ŵakuŵulo'kutemwe' ndalama ; muteke'mitima kufintu ifyo ifi muli nafyo ; pakuti A ŵene ŵalilaŵile ati : Tesi ŋkuleke neli kuleka konse , neli kukusya neli panini .
58013006	Popele tulukulaŵila nemitima ikosele ati : ŴaSikulu ewakuŋgofwa-ko : tesi ntine-po ! Mbomuntu akancite syani ?
58013007	Laŋgulukeni aŵo aŵalukumwikalikeni , aŵalukulaŵila kuli mweŵo Isiwi lyaŵaLesa ; popele , pakulukwalakanya ukupela kwakwikala kwaŵo tentekeni ukucetekela kwaŵo .
58013008	ŴaYesu Klistu eŵopele mailo nalelo nakunsiku syamuyayaya .
58013009	Tekutwalwa kuŵusambisi ubwamikoka namikoka ubwensu : pakuti ukwikaliko'mutima kuluse kuliweme ; tekuwikalika kufyakulya , ifi taŵekutile aŵo aŵendele-mo .
58013010	Tuli neconto camilambu , ifyaceco taŵakwete uŵukulu ubwakulya , aŵo aŵapyunjile'sema .
58013011	Pakuti inama isyo imilopa yasiko eipintwa nekwinjisiwa muŋanda iswetelele kumupapatilisi umukulu , ati mulambu pafyakuŵifya , imiŵili yasiko ilociwa pesonde lyacisasa .
58013012	Pakuti pali fyefyo naŵaYesu , ati ŋgawaswesye aŵantu kumilopa yaŵo aŵene , ŵalisomenwe pesonde lyacilyaŋgwa .
58013013	Ŋgatuye lomba kuli ŵo kwisonde lyacisasa , ili tupinto' mupufyo waŵo .
58013014	Pakuti kuno tatukwete umusi uwakwikalilila , sombi tulukufwaya-fwayo'yo ukesa .
58013015	Muli ŵo lomba ŋgatulukuposa-posa kuli ŵaLesa umulambu uwakucindika , ifisepo ifyakumilomo iilukufisulula kwisina lyaŵo .
58013016	Sombi mwiluŵa-ko ukulukucite'fiweme nekulukwambala ; pakuti ŵaLesa ŵalitemenwe imilambu iyakuŵe'fyo .
58013017	Kamulukuŵomfwa aŵo aŵalukumwikalikeni , nekukomekwa kuli ŵo ; pakuti ŵalacete'mitima yenu , koti ŵantu aŵakaŵulisisye'fyeŵo ; ati ŋgawakacite'fyo nekusaŋgalala , nekuŵulo'kusisimuka ; pakuti ifyo fyalukoso kuli mweŵo .
58013018	Mututembelele : pakuti tulukucetekela ati tuli nacimaŋga uweme , nekulukufwayo'kulukwikele ukuweme mufintu fyonse .
58013019	Kaŵili ndukumucenjesyeni ati mulukucite'fyo ukwakucila , ati ŋkabwesesiwe bwaŋgu kuli mweŵo .
58013020	Lomba ŵaLesa ŵaŵutende , aŵafumisye paŵafwile Umwembesi wambelele uyo umukulu , eŵaSikulu ŵesu Yesu , mumilopa yakulayana ukwamuyayaya ,
58013021	ŋgaŵamuwamisyeni mumilimo yonse iweme mukucita koti kufwaya kwaŵo , ukulukucita muli fweŵo ifyakutemwesya pamenso aŵo pakuti pali ŵa Yesu Klistu ; aŵo kuli ŵo ekuŵe uŵuleme insiku syonse isyamuyayaya . Ameni .
58013022	Sombi ndukumucenjesyeni , mweŵakwasu , ati musumine isiwi lyakucenjesya ; pakuti namulembeleni iŋkalata yamasiwi ace .
58013023	Mwisiŵe ati umukwasu Timote alikakulwilwe ; popele ŋkamuŵoneni pamo nakwe kani akese bwaŋgu .
58013024	Kamuwasekela ŵonse aŵo aŵamwikalikeni newaluŋgeme ŵonse . Aŵamucalo calialya ŵalukumusekeleni .
58013025	Uluse Iwikale nenu mwense . Ameni .
59001001	NeJakobo , nemupyunjisi waŵaLesa newaŵaSikulu Yesu Klistu , ndukusekela imikoka yaŵantu iyo ikumi naiŵili ipalaŋgene : Mitonde .
59001002	Mweŵakwasu , pakuponena mufyakwesya ifinji , kamweŵe'fyo ati kusaŋgalala konse ;
59001003	pakuti pakwisiŵa ati ukwesya kwakucetokela kwenu kulaleŋgo'kuteke'mitima .
59001004	Popele umutimanteka ŋgawikale nemilimo yauko iwaminine , ati namweŵo mukalukuli ŵawaminine , ŵaŵuluŵulu , ŵakuŵula neli kantu .
59001005	Sombi kani pali mweŵo umbi taakwete-mano , ŋgaalombe kuli ŵaLesa , aŵaŵapela lukoso ŵonse , aŵataŵapatapo ; popele akapelwa kuli ye .
59001006	Sombi ŋgaalombe nekucetekela uwakuŵulo'kukanika neli panini ; pakuti uyo ukanika ali koti liŋkapa ilyapacisiŵa ilitwitwe kucipupu ililukupaŵaka .
59001007	Pakuti uyo-muntu elaŋguluka ati ŋkapoka akantu kuli ŵaSikulu :
59001008	muntu wamitima iŵili , uwakukaŋkasima munsila syakwe syonse .
59001009	Sombi umukwasu ucepele ŋgaalitote pakusuntulwa kwakwe ;
59001010	nemusambasi ŋgaalitote pakucefiwa kwakwe : pakuti koti liluŵa ilyakucani akapitilila .
59001011	Pakuti akasuŵa kalema nekuŵaŵula , nekumye'cani ; popele iluŵa ilyakoko lilapona , neŵulombe bwamekalilo alilyo naŵo ŵulafwa ; fyopele'fyo nemilsambasi akalela panyendo syakwe .
59001012	Alisyucile uyo-muntu upinte'fyakwesya ; pakuti , pakusumininwa , akapoko'muntinya wamweo , uyu ŵalaile ŵaSikulu ukuŵapela aŵo aŵaŵatemwa .
59001013	Aŵantu ŵonse neli umo ŵeŋgalaŵila , pakwesiwa , ati , Ndukwesiwa kuli ŵaLcsa : pakuti ŵaLesa taŵesiwa kukuŵifya , kaŵili aŵene taŵaŵesya aŵantu neli umo ;
59001014	sombi aŵantu ŵonse ŵalesiwa pakutwalwa kukukumbwa kwaŵo aŵene nekoŋgolwa .
59001015	Popele apo ukukumbwa , pakwimita , kulafyalo'kuŵifya : nekuŵifya nako , pakukula , kulafyale' mfwa .
59001016	Tekutumpaikwa , mweŵakwasu mwentemenwe !
59001017	Impese syonse isiweme nefyaluse fyonse ifiwaminine filatulila kwiulu , nekuseluka ukufuma kuli ŵa Wisifwe aŵakutuŵa , aŵataŵalipo nekwaluka , neli cinsiŋgwa icakucitwa pakusyoloka .
59001018	Koti kufwaya kwaŵo ŵalitufyele kwisiwi lyaŵucine ; ati tukalukuli koti fyamutulu ifyapafintu fyaŵo itileŋgelwe .
59001019	Ifyo mulifiisi , mweŵakwasu mwentemenwe . Sombi aŵantu ŵonse ŋgaŵekale ŵakwaŋgufyo'kumfwa , ŵakukokolo'kulaŵila , ŵakukokolo'kufitwa ;
59001020	pakuti ukufitwa kwaŵantunsi takucito'kuluŋgama kwaŵaLesa .
59001021	Pakuti pali fyefyo fumyeni uŵusali ŵonse nekuŵifya ukufulile , mupoke nekutekanya isiwi ilyakuŵyala mumutima , iliisi ukupulusye'mitima yenu .
59001022	Sombi muŵe ŵakucita isiwi , teŵakumfwa lukoso , aŵalukulitumpaika , koku .
59001023	Pakuti kani umuntu wakumfwe'siwi lukoso , uwakuŵulo'kucita , ali koti muntu ulukulitamba pamenso akwe acifyalilo mucilolelo ;
59001024	pakuti alukulitamba , popele nekukumbuluka , nekupulilila ukuluŵa-ko amekalilo akwe .
59001025	Sombi uyo uceŵa mwifunde iliwaminine , ilyabwana-bwaŵene , nekulukwikele'fyo utaali wakumfwa uwakuluŵa-ko , koku , sombi wakucite'milimo , uyo eukasyucila mukucita kwakwe .
59001026	Pali mweŵo kani umuntu alukulieŵa ati nineŵakupupe'cine , kani taalukukanyo'lumini lwakwe , sombi alukutumpaika umutima wakwe , ukupupa kwa muntu uyo kwalukoso .
59001027	Ukupupa ukuswetele ukwakuŵule'fiŵipile pamenso aŵaLesa ŵa Wisifwe nikuku : ukuya-kuŵona aŵana-ŵansiwa naŵamukamfwilwe pakukululuka kwaŵo , nekulilama wakuwule'fiko ifyamucalo capansi .
59002001	Mweŵakwasu , tekulukuli nekucetekela ukwamuli ŵaSikulu ŵesu Yesu Klistu awawuleme nemisalululo paŵantu .
59002002	Pakuti kani mwisunagoge Iyenu mwinjile umuntu uli nensalamu yegolide , ufwite ifyakufwala ifiweme makosa , nekwinjila kaŵili neupeŋgele ufwite ifyakufwala ifiŵipile ;
59002003	namweŵo nekumulaŋguluko'vo ufwite ifyakufwala ifiweme , nekulaŵila kuli ye ati : Ikaleni pano apaweme ! nekulaŵila nakuli woyo upeŋgele , ati : Imakanino'ko ! neli ati : Ikalila apa pansi apali icipuna icakusamika-po amakasa anji !
59002004	Kansi tamwalililekenye nekuŵa ŵakusololola aŵakwalakanya ukuŵipile ?
59002005	Umfweni , mweŵakwasu mwentemenwe ! ŴaLesa kansi taŵalisalulwile aŵo awapeŋgele ifyaŵuŵoni ubwamucalo capansi ukwikala ŵaŵile nekucetekela , nimpyani syaŵufumu uŵo uŵu ŵalaile ukuŵapela aŵo aŵaŵatemwa ?
59002006	Sombi mweŵo mwalipufisye uyo upeŋgele , Aŵaŵile kansi taŵalamukatasyeni , aŵene nekumukuleni ukumutwaleni kumasolololo ?
59002007	Taŵalacoŵola isine'lyo ilyaŵuleme ili mwilikwa mweŵo ?
